prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Tint Lipstick 9.5 g, 02 Cherry Ade
title: "Vibrant Beauty: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Tint Cherry Ade Review"
review: The ETUDE Dear Darling Water Tint in Cherry Ade (21AD) is a delightful addition to my makeup routine, offering a vivid burst of color with a lightweight and moisturizing formula. As a fan of K-beauty products, I was excited to try this lip tint, and it certainly did not disappoint.One of the standout features of this water tint is its vivid color payoff. The Cherry Ade shade adds a vibrant pop of red to my lips, instantly brightening up my complexion and adding a touch of playfulness to my look. The color is buildable, allowing me to achieve my desired intensity with ease.What sets this water tint apart is its moisturizing formula. Unlike some lip stains that can leave my lips feeling dry and parched, the Dear Darling Water Tint keeps my lips hydrated throughout the day. The weightless and non-sticky finish is comfortable to wear, making it perfect for everyday use.I also appreciate the smudge-proof and lightweight nature of this lip tint. Once applied, it stays put for hours without fading or feathering, allowing me to go about my day with confidence. Whether I'm sipping on coffee or enjoying a meal, I can trust that my lip color will remain intact.Another aspect that I love about this product is its versatility. In addition to being used as a lip tint, I've found that it can also double as a cheek stain, adding a natural flush of color to my complexion for a fresh and youthful look.In summary, the ETUDE Dear Darling Water Tint in Cherry Ade (21AD) is a must-have for anyone looking for a vibrant and moisturizing lip stain. Its smudge-proof and lightweight formula, coupled with its vivid color payoff, make it a standout choice in the world of K-beauty. Whether you're a makeup enthusiast or simply love experimenting with different looks, this water tint is sure to become a staple in your collection.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 February 2024

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Tint Lipstick 9.5 g, 02 Cherry Ade
title: Perfect for lasting tint
review: I freaking LOVE this product. Its very runny, almost like dyed water, but that makes it no less effective. You don't need to leave it on long for a subtle hint of colour. If you want to go darker, just reapply until you have the desired shade! It also lasts so long. I won't say it stays exactly how you applied it all day, it will gradually fade and may need a top up or two throughout the day. But personally even after a long day AND washing my face, there's still a lovely subtle hint of colour that makes me look more glowy and less pasty. It's also fantastic to use under red lipstick to maintain the colour.This could also double as a blush, however you have to be quick with the application. I've found a little drop on a sponge helps disperse the product, giving a gentle glow. But don't go OTT, or you'll get clown cheeks that are hard to clean up!To sum up, an all round fantastic product that's awesome for the price. Couldn't live without!
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 November 2023

review: I wish I‚Äôd never discovered and took heed of all the hype and fuss over these wonderful lip inventions!.It‚Äôs costing me a fortune!.They have so many drop dead gorgeous colours to choose from that it‚Äôs overwhelming.This product just makes your lips look fantastic.And helps you on the way to the Brigitte Bardot,Angelina Jolie full pout you‚Äôve always yearned for!.Yes,it‚Äôs like a lip gloss but with a big difference,it makes your lips look so juicy and plump and leaves a stain at the same time.And what‚Äôs more with the nude,sheer and natural colours that give you‚Äôre lips a slight pop of colour to brighten you‚Äôre pallor.And what‚Äôs more it looks completely natural and like you‚Äôre lips are naked and moist as if they are all you‚Äôre own!.It has to be said that the colour selection is fabulous and ahead of the game.Based on all the juicy fruits.There are colours for absolutely everyone and every skin tone.You may have to sample a good few to hit on the right one (or ones) for you.Experiment and try different colours,but that‚Äôs the fun!.There are also intenser colours perfect for winter,to give you the red frozen lips look and plum and sangria colours to give  you a slightly red wine stained mouth,that is in fashion right now.It has a sumptuous feel to the lips and after you apply it you‚Äôre lips go slightly darker. The only thing is you won‚Äôt be able to buy just one, you‚Äôll probably want to sample many of the whole range!.It just makes you‚Äôre lips look better,fuller and juicier and everyone will want to kiss you but you‚Äôll not be able to let them because you won‚Äôt want to smudge you‚Äôre lip gloss!,but it won‚Äôt matter because you‚Äôre lips are stained and the colour won‚Äôt come completely off anyway!. I recommend you try it.Because it very well might become one of your makeup ‚Äòmust haves‚Äô.And try ‚Äòmulled peach‚Äô out if you like the natural lips look it‚Äôs stunning,it gives you‚Äôre lips a slightly soft and beautiful pop of colour that makes you look glowing and healthy!.This one suits most skin tones.And one of the best ones I‚Äôve tried so far.Go on,treat yourself to one!.Enjoy!. review: I had major doubts if the product is going to be original or not, but this seller is very trustworthy.The product came fully sealed & with a hologram of authenticity.Exactly the colour I ordered & wanted.The formulae is sooooo beautiful,  it's extremely lightweight & feels as if you are applying fruit juice on your lips, it even smells like that.A little colour goes a long way & can be easily built up.The packaging is pretty study but opaque so you can't see the product inside.All in all, I love it & might get other shades in future too.

title: Molto carino
review: Prodotto molto carino. Lucido, morbido, idratante. Quando poi inizia a svanire l'effetto lucido, lascia le labbra leggermente tinte. Il colore √® lucido e non pieno, quindi si abbina bene a molte matite labbra, se si vogliono contornare per definirle meglio.

title: beautiful and natural
review: creamy and not too drying. although it is labelled as a lip tint, it does not tint the colour of your lips, once you wipe it off, the colour is completely gone. it comes off easily through eating and drinking but apart from that, it is a really nice colour and texture and it smells heavenly. it is quite shiny and a gradient effect can be achieved somewhat for a 'natural' look. would buy again.

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: "Juicy Perfection: Rom&nd Juicy Lasting Tint in 25 BARE GRAPE Review"
review: (Used by Wonyoung) The Rom&nd Juicy Lasting Tint in shade 25 BARE GRAPE is a true gem in the realm of lip tints. From its juicy and glossy finish to its long-lasting formula, this tint embodies everything I look for in a lip product.One of the standout features of this tint is its highly-pigmented formula. With just one swipe, it delivers a rich and vibrant color payoff that instantly elevates any makeup look. The shade 25 BARE GRAPE is the perfect MLBB (My Lips But Better) hue, adding a touch of sophistication and natural beauty to my lips.What sets this tint apart is its moisturizing properties. Despite its long-lasting formula, it doesn't dry out my lips like some other lip products tend to do. Instead, it keeps my lips feeling soft, supple, and hydrated throughout the day, thanks to its nourishing ingredients.I appreciate how versatile this tint is. Whether I'm going for a clear and natural makeup look or building up the intensity for a more dramatic effect, the Rom&nd Juicy Lasting Tint delivers every time. Its glossy finish adds a touch of dimension to my lips, giving them a plump and luscious appearance.As a fan of K-beauty products, I'm delighted to have discovered this gem. The 5.5g / 0.2 oz size ensures that I can take it with me wherever I go, making it the perfect lip companion for daily wear.In summary, the Rom&nd Juicy Lasting Tint in shade 25 BARE GRAPE is a must-have addition to any makeup collection. Its juicy finish, long-lasting formula, and highly-pigmented color make it a standout product in the world of lip tints. Whether you're a K-beauty enthusiast or simply looking for a reliable lip product, this tint won't disappoint.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 February 2024

Packaging is spot on and it's got a nice fruity smell to it that can be quite addictive. It's simply easy to apply and has that glossy yet natural finish. My partner even agreed and said my lips looked naturally plump after applying them. It's just a great product for daily use, will Def get a handful after they've all been used. ‚ù§Ô∏è

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Lasting yes, but not "juicy" look
review: I got 07 Jujube thinking it was an orange-y or soft brown-y red tone tint with fresh glossy buildable look & texture like the sample photos, but it was rather a solid dark smokey red/pink paint. Maybe it just didn't work on my lips and I expected too much, but I wasn't too impressed.It definitely stains your lips so if you apply one coat, leave it on for a bit and press a tissue over it to remove the tint then reapply another coat, the dark red/pink colour will stay on even after the surface colour is being wiped off.If you are looking for a tint with strong/unique colour then this does the job, but if you are after some sheer juicy buildable result like the sample photo then this isn't.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 March 2023

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: I love this tint
review: It smells and tastes so gooddddd. It also looks stunning and is perfect to create that signature Korean lip ombre look, or just put a straight tone over your lips. It's a little more pigmented than a tint, but definitely is still transluscent. It's kind of moisturizing, but my lips still feel a little dry once it has completely worn off. It does take quite a while to wear off, too! And even when it fades, it holds the dewy feel for longer and a slight tint of color stays longest of all except if you drink or eat.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 February 2024

prod_name: Romand Fruits Series Juicy Lasting Lip Tint 5.5 g, 19 Almond Rose
title: Very beautiful liptint but...
review: It's a very beautiful lip tint! You gotta first blend it out with your finger, than put a thick layer in the middle of your lips and let it sit to form the shine and than blend it out again and add more. It also tints really nicely and I had it on my hand for 1 and a half days. But...1. Sadly the tint doesn't last long on my lips for some reason :/ like on my hand and cheeks it lasts long but not on my lips. Maybe I lick them too much or they're too moisturized lol2. It's not as dark as the pictures show :( it's more bright (as you can see in different lighting)3. It's cheaper on yesstyle but I only found out after my husband already bought it off of Amazon

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: Very pigmented and lightweight!
review: I purchased this in the custard mauve shade and I am in love!!!  It feels very watery when applied and has a softly whipped texture.  It has a more satin finish, but it doesn't feel drying or heavy.  The scent is lightly fruity and isn't overpowering.  This shade is not too dark, which is something I encounter with some mauves.  It does stain the lips slightly and has a pretty decent wear time.  I would definitely say it can last through a meal or two!  This shade is gorgeous when blended over the natural lip line. I am eager to try more shades and see if they live up to the expectations that this one sets!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 13 January 2024

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: Long-lasting tint, sheer yet pigmented and very buildable, not super moisturizing
review: I love this gloss. It's pretty long-lasting - the glossiness wears off pretty quickly (I add shine by using the Romand lip water gloss over top - it's really amazing). I'd say the tint lasts about 3 hours.One swipe is actually quite pigmented. If you want it more sheer, you can add a few dollops and rub it in with your finger. If you want it more pigmented, it's definitely really buildable!If I want the color to be pigmented, I like to dab my lips with tissues after applying to leave the tint, then layer another layer on top and repeat. This add pigment to the stain, rather than just the product.I wouldn't say it's super moisturizing, but since there is absolutely no transfer after dabbing your lips, I can easily add lip balm without ruining my lip balm.I have pretty fair and cool-ish skin and I found the Salty Peach shade to be too peachy for me. Canyon is absolutely perfect - it's a light brick color which is a bit darker than my natural lip color. This makes the perfect color (for me) to wear a red lip without committing to a red lip. In my opinion, Canyon is really great for both warmer and cooler months.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 19 July 2023

prod_name: Romand Dewyful Water Lip Tint 5 g, No.12 Canyon
title: Leaks! *update solved*
review: Update! So I was googling and haven‚Äôt seen anyone find a solution for this leaking, it seems it wasn‚Äôt from being tilted even upright it was leaking and it seems the product was being pulled upwards from the crevices where it can come apart (the part other reviews show broke) so I put a thin coat of super glue all around it and that seems to have stopped it from getting messy! This is an unavoidable issue with this product and rom&nds packaging so if you love their lip tints I highly suggest doing this even if it‚Äôs not currently leaking, because it eventually willHad to leave this review since no one talks about it, the lip tint is amazing long lasting and dewy so beautiful and the packaging is sleek and pretty BUT it leaks so bad! You have to keep this upright at all times, it‚Äôs not a one-off defective product it will always leak, so be aware if that will be an issue for you
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 July 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Perfect!
review: I was looking for a lip color for a special event where there'll be lots of eating and drinking, so knew I wanted a no fuss stain. Starting with the color, Dracula Red, it's absolutely perfect. It could probably work well as stage blood! It smells phenomenal, but not overpowering. Most importantly it lasts on the lips. I applied it, let it dry down, then blotted. I put a similar colored gloss on top after blotting. The stain was still there even after the gloss wore away. In fact, it lasted for hours. I think I may need every color of this product. I can't believe how little I spent on it for the quality I got!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 December 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Dyes everything-good or bad
review: I‚Äôve been looking for a new lip tint since so many are discontinued. This is VERY tinted and pretty but be careful to put it on a tiny bit at a time and let dry or your teeth will look like you‚Äôve been chomping at fake blood capsules for hours.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 December 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Kinda sticky
review: I like this stain overall. It‚Äôs definitely sticky at first but that fades. I wish it lasted a bit longer! Good product all things considered.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 28 December 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Worth it
review: I really want a stain that STAINS and stays on my lips without much maintenance. This was prob one of the better/best lip ones I've used. It's better and longer lasting than many high end products (looking at you fenty poutcicle), and more saturated than I was expecting.I got the shade Dracula Red and it went on as a bold fuchsia/red that faded to a nice deep rose over time. Not too much for everyday wear in my opinion. The consistency is really light and watery, and dries down to feel like almost nothing. Gloss/balm over top doesn't take it off, and it lasted through eating and drinking.My only complaint is it does fade over the day and look a little spotty (my center lip fades faster than the edges), but it fades nicely and reapplies easily. I'd like more color variety as looks like most are similar pink/red shades and I'd love a brighter orange, coral, hot pink. I will prob get another though - for the price it can't be beat!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 October 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Absolutely amazing
review: I would buy this again and again, perfect lip tint, long lasting and it‚Äôs so pigmented that a little goes a really long way. The price is absolutely amazing as well. I am still using mine that I got in september and it‚Äôs not even half way done!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 January 2024

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Just ok
review: It is very very sticky, and a lip stain is meant to be applied, allowed to set for a few minutes, then wiped off leaving your lips stained. This reminds me more of a child drinking red stuff than it does a quality lip stain. I probably would not try it again.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 27 December 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Amazing blush ü¶ã
review: If you do have pigment it won't show up as much as a tint . So I use it as a lipstick rather than tint on lips & it's very good to use as a cheek tint, very long lasting and the shade is beautiful ‚ú® I got it for ‚Çπ360 ‚ù§

review: its super good but be careful because it STAINS

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Messy
review: The color stays fairly well, but be careful - it stains everything it touches!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 January 2024

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: A good TRUE red! that stays put!!
review: Shade RD302/Dracula Red. Wicked stoked about the color here - I have other tints from Etude and other brands and a lot of them pull pink. Taste is a bit weird on application but goes away pretty quickly; dry down is really fast and the color STAYS PUT.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 December 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Same formula as the ice cream series
review: I love Etude house's watery tints.When applied full strength, it gives a very dramatic look.When blurred out, it gives off a healthy glow.Makes a cute blush in a pinch, too.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 November 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: It‚Äôs Great!
review: Fabulous colors! Glides on easily; gently fades. A little goes a long way‚Ä¶
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 December 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Uneven stain
review: Great color and very long lasting, however it applies very splotchy for me. Whenever I use it, it looks terrible on my lips after 10 minutes because it divides along my lip lines. Also bleeds into my teeth when first applying, but I would not mind if the color went on more evenly. Almost embarrassing to wear because the splotchiness is difficult to even remove so my whole day has weird uneven colored lips
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 November 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: RD302 not really red
review: Was hoping for a maroon red, which is what the product pictures show. When you put this on it is thin and wet, and doesn‚Äôt really dry down so you have to blott or wipe it off. Once you wipe it off it‚Äôs bright pink. The picture I added shows what it looks like before you wipe it off, and then after you wipe it off. Seems to stain just fine if you like the color pink, just wasn‚Äôt what I was looking for.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 13 March 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: I only wear lip stain and I have yet to find a perfect one.
review: This goes on a little thick, but if I work with it enough it does a nice deep red that I can cover with chapstick and get away with a couple hours. It doesn't transfer like the others but I do have to let it dry first. I wouldn't recommend using gloss on top of it only chapstick because otherwise it'll run.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 November 2022

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: I love it!
review: It‚Äôs a lil sticky but I don‚Äôt mind. I got Dracula red and might get a browner shade later like sweet potato. It has a faint fake grape scent that‚Äôs reminiscent of the lip glosses I wore as a little girl and I love it. Taste good lol. Only down fall is longevity could be a tad better but it‚Äôs good enough for the price. I have Dracula red and the picture is of only one application
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 March 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Comes off fast but tastes good
review: I honestly really liked the smell and taste of it. It kinda tasted like grapes lol. However it doesn't last that long and will come off easily with drinks and food. It also stains my lips unevenly sooo idk
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 December 2022

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Strange scent in the tube of tint
review: I love the color. But the tint itself has some kind of smell similar to gasoline. It goes away after a while, which is good, because the tint really does stay on once it‚Äôs applied!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 December 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Pigment is okay and lasts long but is drying and has a very strong scent.
review: I like the pigment of this stain and its staying power. However, it dried out my lips terribly so I stopped using it. Also, it has a very strong candy-like fragrance that I did not care for. I‚Äôm usually okay with subtle fragrances but this is too much.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 November 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Good color
review: This product imparts a great tint.

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
review: Perfect!! Easy not messy. I don‚Äôt wear makeup often or lipstick pretty much ever but I‚Äôm in love.

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: TERRIBLE. Chemical smell, accentuates lines
review: This will sink into any lines on your lips and just look like a hot mess after about 3 minutes. The worst part is the smell. It is the most chemical cherry smell, almost smells like a cleaning product to me. The smell is so off putting that I honestly don't feel safe putting it on my mouth. I chucked it into the bin after trying it out. I don't understand the rave reviews!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 25 February 2024

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: It‚Äôs thiccccccc
review: I thought this was going to be a very sheer tint that is buildable but let me tell you this stuff is thick. The color is very vibrant even if you put a little bit on. Mine smells and tastes a bit like artificial cherry not too bad. I just think it‚Äôs not a everyday wearables color for my own preference. If you like a very vibrant string color you‚Äôll like this but if you wanted a sheet buildbake color like me I would say stay away
date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 December 2022

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Better than Benetint hands down. Bought 4 more.
review: Perfect stain tint  stays in place forever better than Benetint , hands-down the best laptop I‚Äôve ever used bought five of them run don‚Äôt walk
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 July 2023

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Worth buying
review: I really like the product it's give me effortlessly pinkish red lips. Long lasting

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Meh
review: Little bit disappointed with the product. I got the Dracula red color and it‚Äôs pretty but stains so fast!you have to apply the right amount of tint or you will definitely have harder time removing the stain. Also, I didn‚Äôt like the strong fruity smell, it smells like a cough syrup
date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 February 2024

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: More fushia than blood red
review: I got Dracula Red and it is way more fushia toned than the photo. It is definitely not a blood red but more pink/purple toned. Pretty if you want that color, but this is rarely a color that goes with my coloring (fair skinned with dark reddish brown hair‚Ä¶I need the blood reds or warm reds).Disappointed, would order another color but since this one was off from the pic I‚Äôm afraid to. It is saturated and has staying power, so those are the good things.Idk‚Ä¶ maybe the company will see this review and ship me a true Dracula color like the pic‚Ä¶one can dream lol
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 January 2022

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: I truly do not understand all the rave reviews
review: This has such great reviews I HAD to try it because my holy grail product would be a lip stain that actually stays on. This‚Ä¶ does not. I bought 3 colors, two of them darker reds. One is absurdly bright/garish when first applied and leaves only a barely noticeable stain if blotted. The other is a gorgeous deep red that is beautiful with two or three coats (blotted in between). The problem with all three is that the stain doesn‚Äôt even last an hour after you apply it. If you eat, drink, or lick your lips, it‚Äôs GONE. Also, if you lick your lips, it WILL get on your teeth.I don‚Äôt know if all the rave reviews have some secret to the way they apply it, but the product I received absolutely did not live up to those reviews.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 30 May 2022

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Shade
review: This is not the same shade as it used to be. Rather than a reddish color it is more pink  I ordered 2 thinking it was the shade it used to be but no. It's a very good product. Non stick, sheer, shiny. But I'm upset with the shade. Because I really wanted the darker reddish shade it used to be.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 July 2022

prod_name: ETUDE Dear Darling Water Gel Lip Tint Lipstick
title: Horrible taste - Buyer beware
review: I wanted to like this lip tint as it looked quite decent on application- but it immediately tastes so bad I had to spit it out. I seldom have this reaction. There must be something in it that doesn‚Äôt agree with me. It‚Äôs going in the garbage.

prod_name: Revlon Kiss‚Ñ¢ Balm, Sweet Cherry, 2.6g
title: NA
review: I love it! It smells so sweet and i just love the colour. If you live in Australia like me, if u get this make sure to put it in the fridge straight away! If u apply it on your lips it'll put too much since it's melted. So make sure to put it in the fridge. Sadly, i dropped it on the floor and it just splatted on the ground :(. It's completely my fault since it slipped out of my fingers. 10/10 and you should totally get it.

title: NA
review: This smells like bubble gum and is a really pretty pink shade. The top, shiny layer wears off quite quickly but the underlying layer lasts for hours. Very happy!

title: NA
review: Good and moisture lip balm but the colour...What is going on with this lip balm colour? its so red that it almost looks like red lipstick. First, I was unawear of this colour and i smeared on my lips, I did not relized until a friend told me and I looked in the mirror I look like clown.

prod_name: Revlon Kiss‚Ñ¢ Balm, Sweet Cherry, 2.6g
title: NA
review: I love it! It smells so sweet and i just love the colour. If you live in Australia like me, if u get this make sure to put it in the fridge straight away! If u apply it on your lips it'll put too much since it's melted. So make sure to put it in the fridge. Sadly, i dropped it on the floor and it just splatted on the ground :(. It's completely my fault since it slipped out of my fingers. 10/10 and you should totally get it.

prod_name: Revlon Kiss‚Ñ¢ Balm, Sweet Cherry, 2.6g
title: NA
review: Beautiful colour and smell but no longevity. Barely lasts an hour before having to reapply.

prod_name: Revlon Kiss‚Ñ¢ Balm, Sweet Cherry, 2.6g
title: NA
review: This smells like bubble gum and is a really pretty pink shade. The top, shiny layer wears off quite quickly but the underlying layer lasts for hours. I took the advice of other reviewers from Australia who said to put it in the fridge before opening which was a great idea! I love this product. It was such a good price and arrived the next day. Very happy!

prod_name: Revlon Kiss‚Ñ¢ Balm, Sweet Cherry, 2.6g
title: NA
review: A lovely light balm with some sunscreen.  Doesn't last very long but is very smooth and easy to reapply. I wouldn't leave it in a hot car or in the sun though!

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Silk
title: Nice product
review: Sono sincera ho utilizzato per anni rossetti a lunga tenuta, che seccavano le mie labbra, ed apparivano molto secche anche con il rossetto, non era molto estetico, ho iniziato ad applicare solo balsami labbra colorati o trasparenti, tanto sotto la mascherina non vi √® molta differenza, ahime'.Ho testato molti gloss, ma l'antiestetico effetto appiccicoso, non fa per me, quindi avevo molte aspettative in questo  di " Maybelline New York Lifter Gloss, Lucidalabbra con acido ialuronico, Effetto rimpolpante e idratante '', oggetto della mia recensione.Saranno aspettative attese????Il packaging merita menzione, in quanto √® veramente bello, sembra di avere tra le mani un prodotto di fascia alta, molto curato dalla grafica all'estetica, veramente promosso.L'applicatore floccato √® maxi, come il trend lo vuole, ma utilissimo per l'applicazione, segue perfettamente l'anatomia delle labbra senza sbavature.¬ß¬ß¬ß¬ß¬ß  TEXTURE & PIGMENTAZIONE ¬ß¬ß¬ß¬ß¬ßLa texture √® molto fluida, ma risulta molto leggera, nel senso che non da fastidio, non crea spessori, non ha l'effetto appiccicoso dei soliti gloss, l'applicazione risulta scorrevole e immediata anche grazie alla sua pigmentazione piena, almeno nella colorazione da me scelta,  ovvero '' Silk ''.Questa colorazione √® un nude rosato, lo adoro in quanto si sposa benissimo con il tono delle mie labbra,  lo si puo' utilizzare sia per trucchi nude, sia per make up piu' strutturati, insomma risulta portabile in ogni occasione.Ha un effetto brillante, che pian piano si attenua, ma continua a rimanere il colore, per cui non ha una durata eccelsa, ma √® un gloss, pero' rispetto ai classici lucidalabbra, resiste di piu'.Le mie labbra risultano idratate, piene e belle,  sicuramente aiuta l'effetto brillante e l'acido ialuronico  presente nella formulazione, mi trovo davvero bene, anche ad utilizzarlo con la mascherina.Sicuramente, presto provero' altre colorazioni.¬ß¬ß¬ß Colorazioni Disponibili ¬ß¬ß¬ßLe colorazioni non sono tante, ma credo che rispettino tutti i gusti, di seguito:- 001 Pearl  dovrebbe essere trasparente- 002 Ice, un rosa pallido- 004 Silk  la colorazione rosa nude scelta da me (vedi foto)- 005 Petal un rosa piu' scuro, ma sempre nude, questo sara' la mia prossima referenza colore.- 006 Reef un rosa chiaro- 007 Amber √® il nude per eccellenza, ma con toni sul marrone, non sta bene su alcuni sotto toni, tipo il  mio, sta molto bene invece a chi ha una pelle chiara.La quantit√† di prodotto contenuta √® di 5.4ml mentre, la durata dalla data di apertura √® di circa 24 mesi.La formulazione √® accettabile, troverete il dettaglio dell'inci verde, rosso o giallo, nelle foto della mia recensione, di seguito l'elenco senza dettaglio dei valori.Vi posso gia' dire, che l'acido  ialuronico  non √® impiegato in grandi quantita', ma √® normale, anche perche' altrimenti il costo sarebbe decisamente piu' alto, il resto degli ingredienti non √® verde, ma per me √® assolutamente accettabile.C18-36 Acid Triglyceride, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Polybutene, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Diisostearyl Malate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Saccharin, Sorbic Acid, Alumina, Silica, Polybutylene Terephthalate, Trihydroxystearin, Cocos Nucifera Oil / Coconut Oil, Aluminum Hydroxide, Ethylene/Va Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Tin Oxide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tocopherol, Magnesium Silicate, Glucomannan, Parfum / Fragrance.La spedizione super veloce, arriva con il sigillo, per cui non corriamo nessun rischio.Personalmente, lo adoro, sia da solo, sia sopra ad altri rossetti con una texture piu' secca.Ciao

prod_name: Maybelline New York Hydrating Lip Gloss - Topaz
title: It works , does what it's supposed to do.
review: first time I have used this product. I have had other brands in the past, including the more expensive ones, but this is I think the best of the bunch,  mixes well with lipstick colour not making very much difference. It looks coloured in the bottle, but once on your lips, is barely noticeable. I put it on about ten minutes before applying lipstick, which gives it time to 'do it's stuff'  . Lips don't tingle as much as with other lip plumpers which made me wonder whether I had made a mistake, but the results after a few minutes convinced me that this is a great product. There is a slightly sweet taste, but not at all unpleasant,  and there is a slight odour which you can smell once its on, but that again, isn't unpleasant at all. I will be sticking to this one from now on.

title: It works , does what it's supposed to do.
review: first time I have used this product. I have had other brands in the past, including the more expensive ones, but this is I think the best of the bunch,  mixes well with lipstick colour not making very much difference. It looks coloured in the bottle, but once on your lips, is barely noticeable. I put it on about ten minutes before applying lipstick, which gives it time to 'do it's stuff'  . Lips don't tingle as much as with other lip plumpers which made me wonder whether I had made a mistake, but the results after a few minutes convinced me that this is a great product. There is a slightly sweet taste, but not at all unpleasant,  and there is a slight odour which you can smell once its on, but that again, isn't unpleasant at all. I will be sticking to this one from now on.

Ho letto recensioni in cui parlano di un formicolio sulle labbra dopo l'applicazione, personalmente io non ho sentito nulla. I colori di questo gloss della Maybelline sono tutti molto belli, hanno una idratazione fantastica. Come si vede nella foto sopra, dopo l'applicazione le labbra sembrano subito pi√π sane e piene. Non sbava e non appiccica. Profuma di vaniglia. Una pecca molto importante secondo me √® la durata del colore ahim√®, dopo sole 2 ore il colore svanisce e rimane solo il lucido trasparente come se avessi un normale balsamo labbra, perci√≤ vi consiglio di portarlo con voi se vi piace avere le labbra sempre colorate come me. Nel complesso √® un buon prodotto, perch√© il suo colore ( anche se devo rimetterlo dopo poco tempo) e la sua idratazione mi piacciono molto. Il prezzo intorno ai 6,00‚Ç¨ direi che √® buono.Grazie per aver dedicato qualche secondo a leggere la mia recensione, spero vi sia utile.

prod_name: Maybelline New York Superstay Vinyl Ink Longwear Liquid Lipstick in Coy
title: NA
review: I love this colour, it's called Royal and matches Medium Brown skin very nicely, it's not too dark and bright enough for people to comment about how nice it looks. I am not used to wearing or applying long lasting lipsticks so it takes awhile for me to clear up mistakes as it really does stay on. I find if you have a few drinks, the inside of the lipstick does goes away and you can reapply. I use a clear lipstick over the top as there is a slight stickiness to it the entire time and that solves the problem. To remove it, I use Baby Oil and it comes off like magic. I have bought other colours since, and although it gets removed on the inside part of the lips, it's not so obvious with the lighter colours such as Coy. I recommend you trying this.

prod_name: Maybelline New York Superstay Vinyl Ink Longwear Liquid Lipstick in Coy
title: NA
review: Pretty happy with this lipstick, nice colour and moisturising for the lips

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Perfect color for me!
review: This is such a nice lipstick! Not only is the color perfect for me, but the texture is super nice & velvety! Love this & will be buying again!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 January 2024

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Beautiful but I‚Äôm confused
review: Let me start off by saying this is a beautiful lip gloss/stick/blur tint color. I‚Äôm not sure what to call it. It says it‚Äôs a lip tint but it wasn‚Äôt a lip blur or tint on my lips. It just wore like a lipstick on me. I put it on expecting it to turn into one of those super drying and sticky long lasting lip colors, but I was pleasantly surprised when my lips stayed feeling moisturized. The transfer is bad and when you wipe it off it is gone without a tint, but if you leave it alone it is very pretty and keeps your lips moist. If you just plan on talking and looking pretty instead of eating, drinking and smooching your in the clear.  I love the color and the fact that it doesn‚Äôt get sticky and flakey, so if I am going to be in a situation where I can reapply when I eat or drink (I‚Äôve been married too long to smooch in public anymore) then I will definitely keep this one in mind. It really is beautiful and flattering.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 August 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Love this lipstick
review: Bought one and came back to buy anoth in a different color. Goins on smoothly, doesn't smear and is long lasting. Try it, you'll really like it.

review: I personally was not a fan of this lipstick. I really wanted to love it because I've heard such great things about Moonshot products, but this one was not for me.Here are my thoughts:1Ô∏è‚É£ The color is terrible on me. I did not deduct stars for this though because color is based on personal preferences.2Ô∏è‚É£ This lipstick is not at all moisturizing for me as it claims it is. In fact, it has the complete opposite effect and dries my lips out, making them looks like prunes.3Ô∏è‚É£ The title of this product could really confuse some people shopping for lipstick. Is it a blur? A tint? A lipstain? A velvet matte lipstick? It's important to make that distinction because they are NOT all the same. What I can tell you from trying this lip product is that it feels closer to a matte lipstick for me.4Ô∏è‚É£ It most certainly transfers.Overall, it wasn't the worst lipstick I've ever tried, but there are much better products out there in the same price range.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 May 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Mixed Feelings
review: As a fan of Moonshot's cushion foundation, I was excited to try their Performance Lip Blur Fixing Tint. While I didn't hate this product, it didn't quite live up to my expectations as a lip tint. If you're looking for a softer, more subtle lip look, it's great. However, in my opinion, it doesn't provide the longevity I hoped for. The velvet matte finish is lovely, and the avocado protein is a nice touch. Overall, it's decent, but don't expect it to stay on for an extended period.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 25 May 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: NOT transfer proof - Moonshot Performance Lip Blur Fixing Tint
review: First the good stuff - this lip "tint" came in a very pretty, flattering color. It's easy to apply and looks great when you first put it on.However, since they stressed so much that it is transfer-proof in the listing, I will just say, NO, it is not transfer proof. It smudges very easily and definitely transfers. It doesn't stay on long if you do normal things like drink or eat something. It is more of a lipstick as it doesn't tint, just sits on the surface of my lips.I really wanted to like this product but I'm completely underwhelmed. Due to it not wearing long, I think the price is too much. I can buy others that stay on much better for less.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 April 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: A little paint like
review: It feels a little like paint when it goes on and is not very smooth not he lips. The color was also too red for me so I haven't been able to enjoy it much. If you wear it, I would suggest adding a lot of clear gloss over it otherwise your lips will feel like you just put a thin layer of paint on them. it's okay overall
date: Reviewed in the United States on 29 April 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Lip tint in pretty colors w/cute case, but hard to get a smooth, even finish + smudges easily...
review: I ordered several of these lip tints for my teen-aged granddaughter. She is always experimenting with different styles and colors of lip products and I thought she might like these blurring tints. I chose the 'savage', 'hidden-card' & 'power hustle' colors for a fun range of shades that are not too dark or too intense. I think the tints do match the shades shown in the picture accompanying the product description pretty well. What doesn't seem to match is the velvety finish. These are referred to as a tint in one part of the description and a stain in another. They do seem closer to a tint than a stain as they are a bit messy and don't last long without smudging. This is definitely not transfer-proof. But they are a little like a lipstick in that the color sits on top of the skin instead of sinking in and unless there is a light coat, it can dry and crack. The consistency isn't really liquid(y) and it is hard to get smooth, even coverage. My granddaughter likes the colors and she says that these work best for her if she applies very lightly, blots to help with the blur effect, and then adds a lip balm afterward. The current price of $15.00 does seem a bit high to me, but the case is very cute.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 February 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Pretty color, long-lasting, non-dryingüíã
review: I really like so many K-Beauty skincare and makeup products and this MoonShot lipstick is one of them.I don't really get the lip blur/fix part of it but that's okay since I love this color and love the way it looks on my lips.Just be sure to wipe some of the color from the applicator or else it'll go on too thick. That's one problem with this lip stain: it is a little thick and dry-feeling while applying, and I do worry it won't last a long time in the tube. However, if I don't put too much on the sponge applicator or use my own lip brush, I can control the amount and have way better results.This color -- Knockout -- is a knockout! You can see from my photos that the color pretty well matches what they have advertised, but I thought it would be more of an orangey-red and this has more pinks in it ‚Äîhowever it's flattering to my skin-tone so I‚Äôm not unhappy with this color at all.If I put a thin layer on my lips, this lasts a long time. I can drink, lightly kiss, and eat (as long as it's not something oily or buttery), and still have stain left over.It is maybe just a tad drying to my lips but that could also be because our humidity is so low right now and I so far don't have the urge to put lipbalm on my lips and it's been a couple of hours. It doesn't give my lips that 'cracked lip' dry look or as I wear it and drink water, etc, it doesn't start fading out in a drying way. That's a plus.The packaging is happy and pretty and the tube is very nice too. I like the more flattened top--easy to hold.I am happy with my order!Thank you for reading my reviews! ‚ò∫Ô∏è
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Ok, but not for the price
review: Its like a mix between a lipstick and a matte gloss. Its 100% NOT smudge proof, and it transfers to anything that touches your lips. It doesn't feel sticky or dry out, so I did like that, and the color I got was really pretty. Its semi reminiscent of this revlon matte gloss I love, but its just way more expensive. I think the price could be a lot lower. I also feel like calling it a stain or tint is misleading. It wipes off super easy, so it doesnt stain AT ALL. And its way too opaque to be a tint. I will keep using it, because it is alright, but I wouldn't buy it again
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 March 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: lip tint
review: i like the color. goes on slightly creamy. doesn't stay on long
date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 April 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Doesn't dry out like a typical matte lip stain. Beautiful color. Doesn't stay on very long.
review: The lip stain has a mousse like consistency and goes on your lips smoothly. It doesn't dry-out your lips like other ‚Äúmatte‚Äù products that I have used (it's more of a semi-matte). The color was beautiful and natural looking on my Mac NC30 colored skin. My lips are naturally pretty tinted so it was hard to get a "blurred look" using this product. Not really a fault of the product though.Remember to use the product properly if you are desiring a more "blurred" effect. It's really about how you apply the product versus the product itself.  It helps to layer the products and letting it dry between layers and blending in between.It does feel nice on your lips at first application. It doesn't stay on very long though (about 2 hours). Its does fade beautifully (not blotchy) if you forget reapply.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 February 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Too thick for me
review: Any tint or lip stain I‚Äôve used is more of a liquid, gloss consistency. This is in a tube, so I expected it to be a bit more fluid. It‚Äôs like someone crushed up a lipstick and put it in a tube with an applicator. It goes on thick, which is not good on older lips. Every little crevice and microwrinkle was highlighted. If I kept it right within my lip line, it was better. The color sits on my lip. It doesn‚Äôt blend in or tint and it wipes right off even after it‚Äôs set for a bit. The color, ‚ÄúKeen‚Äù is more orange brown than the picture shows, where it looks more like a mauve shade On me, it looked like I‚Äôd smeared my lips with some discolored food. Not complementary to my coloring because it didn‚Äôt look like it did in the picture to me. It might be my monitor, but it‚Äôs not the same color family. I find this drying, like I do many lipsticks. I feels heavy on my lips, like a mask, and unfortunately unpleasant. Your results may vary, since this review is about my skin, my sensitivities, my coloring. I could imagine finding this product awesome, since it‚Äôs a nice product. It just doesn‚Äôt work at all for me.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 9 November 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: velvety texture!
review: The coral/orange red is such a pretty color and brightens up your complexion when you wear this shade. It leaves a velvety finish and you can smudge it for a subtle look. This stays on for a few hours. It does smudge on cups and can be a bit drying if your lips are not moisturized. I like applying a balm before putting this on top as cracked and dry lips with matte lippies are not a pretty sight. The brush could be smoother too.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 March 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Velvet Matte
review: I‚Äôm always on the lookout for matte long wearing lipsticks. Most lipsticks are either not long wearing, not matte or dries too quickly. I think I might have found my new favorite lipstick formula.My lips don‚Äôt feel or look dry. It is 100% velvet matte. No sticky residue or weird taste and it‚Äôs long lasting enough. I always have to reapply, regardless of the brand but the biggest thing is what I have to do to reapply. This, I can just put more over my lips, no need to completely remove. That‚Äôs a big thing for me. It‚Äôs not heavy on my lips.While I like the formula, the color is not my favorite but I can still pull it off. The color is more pinkish on my lips than what‚Äôs pictured. I would have liked it more if it‚Äôs wasn‚Äôt so bright.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 December 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Beautiful color
review: The color is nice and rich. After applying I had to wipe it off a little with tissue it seems to last longer that way. The lipstick didn‚Äôt last me all day especially when I started to eat and drink it seem to break down and also transfer on cups and cans, I needed to re-apply it two times but that‚Äôs a plus since other lipsticks I have to apply more often . I do like the blur affect  it‚Äôs a lively color, this is my first time trying a velvet type lip so I was surprised at how smooth it went on when I applied it. This wasn‚Äôt very moisturizing for me so I recommend exfoliating your lips if you have drier type lips that tend to peel, applying a moisturizer before applying this type of lipstick did help a little bit to make it look better throughout the day.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 November 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Best for smooth lips that have more volume than mine.
review: Rhythm Thru is the deeper of the two neutral-warm peachy tones that seemed to be more natural looking ‚Äì due to my skin tones and natural lip tones, it came out looking more salmon orange than peachy. I found it to be more anti-smudge if you blot it on a napkin once or twice - it did not rub off on my teeth or move outside of where I placed it (I did not use lip liner of any kind for this example).I tried to coat it on thick enough to fill in the lip cracks, but it didn't seem to make a difference for me - maybe my cracks are too deep or numerous. Unfortunately in my case I felt like it made my lips look dry (even though they were not, they felt smooth and hydrated). I suppose I prefer matte lipsticks that I can put a gloss over to help make my lips appear more smooth.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Not a lip tint or stain - just an extra creamy lipstick
review: This is a creamy lipstick with a mousse-like texture. I wouldn‚Äôt call it a tint or stain. It‚Äôs a nebulous sort of product. The color is a smooth, rich berry, and very pretty.The lipstick applies very evenly. It goes on pretty thick and doesn‚Äôt really dry or sink into the lips, so any contact will lead to some color transfer. I didn‚Äôt notice significant color loss while talking or working at my desk, but it didn‚Äôt last through a meal.I wouldn‚Äôt order this again. It‚Äôs not a bad product, but I‚Äôve found so many other lip tints that I like better that this just wouldn‚Äôt make the cut.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 November 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Soft and pretty
review: This is a neat looking bottle. It applies nicely and feels so soft on my lips. Leaves a nice pretty shade. Long lasting and comfortable to wear.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 February 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Great lip tint
review: Love the case this comes in. The color is perfect for my complexion. Stays on all day. Great value!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 June 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: A Decent Smudge-Proof Matte Lipstick for Pre-Moistened Lips
review: PROS:+ Great color+ Stays put for hours (even after eating)+ Decent doe foot applicator (no rough edges or anything weird)+ A little goes a long way so even though the tube looks smaller than average, you'll be able to make it last+ The tube is pleasing to look at and ergonomically nice to hold (it's easier to handle/hold onto while applying than other - more rectangular - products in this genre)CONS:- If your lips are dry/wrinkly, it clumps (in the photo I've attached, I was well-hydrated and had used a lip plumper before applying)- It's very thick in general and can be difficult to apply- $15 is a LOT for what it is... This is akin to Maybelline's SuperStay Matte Ink liquid lipstick (but thicker) which runs $8-11.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 November 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Nice Color, was gone by noon.
review: I chose the color called Keen. I really like the lipColor. It is soft and almost like a blush apricot color. Very nice. The lip tint is nicely packaged in a user friendly pink container with a lid that when unscrews also has the application wand attached. I am used to lip tints that actually tint the lip- then gloss is applied over. This product to me is more like a liquid lipstick in that it didn‚Äôt actually tint my lips. I applied at 7:30 before work. I didn‚Äôt eat or drink and went to the restroom at noon, and there was no color remaining on my lips. If you are looking for longer lasting lip color- this isn‚Äôt it. It is a very nice color and looked nice while on.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Color is pretty
review: I ordered this lip tint in (01) Keen it‚Äôs like a soft peach beige.The packaging is really nice. The color is pretty and that I liked but I‚Äôm not sure if the consistency was off or maybe it‚Äôs from the Avocado protein or what but mine was really thick it was smooth going on but the look was not good I took a paper towel and blotted my lips and it helped but I don‚Äôt really like the matte look. I did add some gloss and it made a big difference in the look but it didn‚Äôt last but a few hours. It‚Äôs just okay to me.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 9 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Pretty, but color is lacking!
review: I was excited to try this Korean lip tint stain. I really haven‚Äôt tried many Korean personal care products, so I was pretty pleasantly surprised with this lip tint. The stain went on nicely and did definitely have a velvet feel to it. The applicator was easy to use and it didn‚Äôt have too much product on it. The two colors I chose were pretty light, and I wish they had had more pigment to them. The stain also wasn‚Äôt as long lasting as I would‚Äôve hoped for. The one thing I really didn‚Äôt like about the packaging was that it didn‚Äôt come sealed, so I didn‚Äôt feel exceptionally safe using it without that. The product wasn‚Äôt overly drying, which was a nice benefit, I just wish the colors would have been more pigmented than they were.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 27 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: creamy opaque liquid lipstick, matte but not drying, feels
review: Nice color, more of a dense matte lipstick opacity than a tint. No idea what they mean by "lip blur fixing tint". Basically doesnt settle into lips, sits on top? I agree with that.I applied it lightly, and totally covers with ease. I found it looked better applied a little heavier.  It doesnt last. Best when there is no intention to eat or drink. I definitely smeared my mug, and it definitely left by the time I was done eating. Pops in photos though!Very creamy feeling, lips feel moisturized. Matte doesnt look too drying. I could not get a stain out of it. I tried the "apply--blot--apply--blot--apply", and it didnt make a stain or add to the staying power.It is a lovely color- kind of a brick color, blue based. That works against my cool fair skin. My lips are pretty pink, so this just gave them a pleasant boost.I like it for the color, ease of application. Didnt leave a hot mess as it faded (very important!). Creaminess despite being matte. Other wise is not all that different than other lipsticks. I like it though
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 August 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Beautiful Velvety Lips
review: This is a very nice velvety powder type lip tint/stain.  It feels nice on. Not drying at all. The color (power hustle) is also very flattering. Applies a bit gloppy but if you smooth it out with your fingertips, it's really beautiful. You can apply just a few dots on the lips and blend it in for a light blurred tint look or go all out for a full on look. I wouldn't say it's transfer proof (I have never personally experience any lipsticks that does not transfer) so I don't know why companies keep making this claim. I only applied a single layer and after eating and drinking, I didnt have to reapply. I was still left with a decent amount of coverage. Overall, it's a good lip tint and the price is average for lip products.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 31 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Pretty soft pink
review: This review is for MOONSHOT Performance Lip Blur F≈•ixing Tint ‚Äì Velvet Matte Liquid Lipstain. I ordered a shade of pink called  XCrush. This lipstain does what I need it to, which is stain my lips with a flush(when applied lightly & rubbed in) of soft pink to enhance my lips. It is more opaque if applied normally(see photo). I always wear  lip balm over lipstain, since stains tend to be drying. I will continue to use this product.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 October 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: DOESN'T MOVE - Excellent Wear Time
review: MOONSHOT Performance Lip Blur Fixing TintI am not a fan of velvet-type lipstick since it normally sticks to any crevice or wrinkle that my lips have acquired.  This lippie filled in those gaps and didn't budge all day long.  The wear time is really impressive.  The color 03 All Genre is a pink-mauve but to me, it has a bit of yellow undertone, not much but enough to appear with a slight orange tint. That tint faded a bit after I applied this.I love the container which is pretty unusual since this is a liquid lip and the packaging is hard with a standard doe foot applicator and it twists open.  This won't get lost in your purse or open easily.  The color really stays put but I did exfoliate with a sugar scrub before applying this and I also tried a lip liner which also helps with any feathering.  Feathering is minimal even with my old skin.IngredientsDimethicone, Isododecane, Silica, Dimethicone/Vinyldimethicone Crosspolymer, Tribehenin, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyglyceryl-10 Tristearate, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Isononyl Isononanoate, Bis-diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Iron Oxide Red (Ci 77491), Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Extract, Sorbitan Isostearate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Trisiloxane, Propylene Carbonate, Octyldodecanol, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Isopropyl Myristate, Isostearic Acid, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-10 Polyricinoleate, Maltodextrin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra Di T Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Fragrance, Yellow Iron Oxide (Ci 77492), Tartrazine (Ci 19140), Lithol Rubine BCA (Ci 15850), Black Iron Oxide (CI 77499), Brilliant Blue FCF (Ci 42090)

I did let the product dry down but there was an amount that still transferred.

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint

review: Beautiful color and long lasting! I used this for a vacation, so there was plenty of salt water, humidity, kissing, drinking, talking and this lip stain held up pretty well!

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Beautiful!
review: This color is actually so beautiful. It feels more like a lip cream when you put it on, but it does dry down, just not enough to not transfer. For the price though, it looks nice, the packaging is cute, and it lasts a decent amount of time if you're not eating/drinking
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 December 2022

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: Not exactly as described but not terrible
review: I got this in power hustle. It‚Äôs really pretty but has a bit more of a pink undertone than a red from what it appeared online. The formula isn‚Äôt runny, glossy or really gloopy. Not quite sure how to describe it honestly. I suppose it‚Äôs kind of velvety. The applicator is okay - doesn‚Äôt smooth it out as well as my finger does. It feels kind of drying on my lips and I‚Äôm not a fan of that feeling lol. I thought this would be more of a tint thing where it didn‚Äôt feel drying but it isn‚Äôt. It does smudge and doesn‚Äôt leave a tint on your lips if you wipe it off. So it is transferable. The color is very pigmented and pretty but not quite what is advertised.

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: pretty

It stays on for a good while as long as I don't mess with it. But if I drink anything, it comes off on my glass. So, it does transfer. It does a decent job of moisturizing while it's on and if I want a bit of sparkle, I just apply a lip gloss overtop the lipstick. This may not be the long lasting tint or blur I expected, but I'm still pretty happy with it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 30 January 2023

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint
title: not sure it worked
review: I got this in Hidden Card, which was more pink than magenta when I put it on. I understand the blurred lips concept, and I've tried using this a couple of times. It didn't feel drying to me, which is good. It did transfer after I used it, which wasn't as nice. It didn't seem to build up much at all; I tried to concentrate it on certain parts of my lips and leave the edges more blurred out, but it all looked the same. Maybe I need to watch more youtube videos...

prod_name: MOONSHOT Performance Blur Fixing Tint

It is very matte with absolutely no shine whatsoever.  If that is what you want & you like the color, this would be a good choice.

prod_name: Peripera Ink Velvet #3 Red Only, 4 g
title: Great lip color that doesn't transfer
review: This was a Prime Day recommendation and I took a chance!  In short, great product for the. money. My favorite lip stain is a water based one and no longer available. This is not at all like that, but a lip color that is very highly pigmented (I got the red color) It has to be applied carefully, and since it comes with a sponge tip. For more precise application, I used a lip brush.  No problem...it stays in place, doesn't bleed. I will say it looked great immediately. Matte, which is the trend now.  I continue to wear my mask, and I could NOT believe it absolutely did NOT transfer on the mask, even after being outdoor for hours in 90 degrees with 90 percent humidity! That is amazing as all my other 3x more expensive lipsticks did transfer to the mask (hated). Another benefit is while this is long lasting, it doesn't make your lips dry. You can feel it, but it is not bothersome (I'm super picky). Going on, it has a tiny bit of a flavor, so light that I can't even identify it, but it is pleasant, but it immediately fades. I personally don't want flavored lips.  I would bill this a a long-wearing lip color, not a true lip stain. It is a GREAT product for the money. Don't hesitate to give it a go.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 July 2022

prod_name: Peripera Ink Velvet #3 Red Only, 4 g
title: Ok Year Update- MY DENTIST REQUESTED BRAND AND SHADE
review: Quick update ‚Äì I had a dental procedure done which included nitrous oxide and a lengthy procedure to which my lipstick remained on flaky and perfectly tinted and at the end of the procedure my dentist asked me the brand and the shade of lipstick I had been using as she had not seen anything like it and was very into make up  herself, or so the front desk said when they asked me for the shade. ‚Ä¢As far as MOISTURIZING goes, like most long term lip staining products, this one will apply better if you use a balm or clear colored matte type of uncolored lip base, even chapstick under it will outperform most other brands of long last lip color AND especially for the PRICE. I went with the red one in order to ensure this wasn‚Äôt like other sheer colored stains I‚Äôve tried that look dark yet when applied are light pink, and my advice is to believe what the color shows you it will be, as you don‚Äôt need to overcompensate on this product. Less is more as well. Just a dab of this smeared across lips goes a king way, or can be used as a lip liner for a very formal pout with the crisp lines of Betty Boop. It can be glossy or matte, as I also recommend using a colored or clear gloss or top coat so that it feels like it is set in and your lips feel like they are not dry. Experiment with different lipsticks or wand colors and you will have produced a color that is entirely ‚Äúyou,‚Äù as many people have asked what lipstick shade I‚Äôm wearing, and I can‚Äôt explain that I combined 3 different products to get the look I wore. Three products that were in my purse at that moment. Bottom line...buy it. A multi use product that will last you a year. And if you don‚Äôt like it/worth the $8 to find out if not because you can easily regift it, to your sister on her next staycation she gets paid for.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 19 February 2021

prod_name: Peripera Ink Velvet #3 Red Only, 4 g
title: Peripera please make darker colors lol
review: Purchased the #3 red only tint and its pretty! a little brighter than what i usually wear. I wish they made darker reds/plums - sigh- lol I love that the formula actually appears soft and smooth like velvet. its not oily or patchy or spreads uneven like a watery tint... its has a soft almost airbrushed appearance. Not a totally dry dry liquid matte lip has a mousse consistency which i like, its not so drying, but if you would prefer to matte it down just dab on a napkin it doesnt transfer much after. My only complaint is it doesnt last after eating. i attached photos after application and after eating. If youre looking for something that requires less touch ups i recommend the airy ink velvets instead they last longer or the ink gelato series from peripera :) those are my go to so far. But these are good :)

prod_name: Peripera Ink Velvet #3 Red Only, 4 g
title: New holy grail lipstick!
review: I'm not normally one to write reviews, but I'm so pleased with this product that I felt obligated to! I even came back to grab a few more colors because the pricepoint is great! I'm obsessed with matte lipsticks! What I'm not obsessed with is how most matte lipsticks leave your lips dry, cakey, and flakey! NOT THIS ONE. The texture of this product is phenomenal! So lightweight, barely feels like anything is on my lips when it dries. Substantially more comfortable than typical lipsticks. Instead of intensifying the cracks in my lips, it smoothed right over them. It leaves my lips looking plumped and perfectly matte. A little bit of this product goes a long way so be sure not to apply too much! I found applying a dab in the center of your lips and using your finger to spread and pat around gives the best effect! I like this lipstick even more than my Jeffree Star Liquid lipsticks! Highly recommend for anyone looking for a lightweight matte lipstick.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 April 2020

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Excellent Lipstick
review: I‚Äôve been using Mineral Fusion lipstick for years, but have only used the colour Burst until today when I bought Peony. I‚Äôd been looking for more of a red lipstick, and was happy to find this one! It‚Äôs not true red, but that wasn‚Äôt what I was after! I was happy to find it was a nice spiced red with notes of rust and pink, and a cool undertone. Great for fall/winter photos!The lipstick is nicely moisturizing, and lasts a long time. (Tip for any lipstick: apply, blot, apply another coat.)The scent is kind of a soft sweet smell, and for some reason, reminds me of the smell of play dough. Not offensive in my opinion, but if you don‚Äôt like it, you don‚Äôt like it.Overall, I‚Äôm just really pleased with this product. I don‚Äôt always get to give a 5 star review! Please note that I edited the photo of my smile in order to make it as close to the real colour as I could.

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Mineral Fusion Burst is my go-to color
review: I‚Äôm a fair-skinned Asian with dark brown hair, and Mineral Fusion‚Äôs Burst color is my favorite color to wear day or night. It‚Äôs a natural salmon/warm pink thrat‚Äôs just enough color without being too much color. It can be worn without lipliner, and has just enough thick/creamy texture for good coverage. If your lips have a slightly darker shade to them, this color also balances well against that too.I like it in summer as well as winter months. You do have to be careful about ordering this online in hot summer months, because it can arrived softened which makes the lipstick want to fall off the base as soon as you apply it. Try cooling it off first. I‚Äôve also sometimes found Mineral Fusion lipsticks at Whole Foods, although the Burst color is usually not in stock in stores.I really like that it‚Äôs fragrance free and paraben free, and the seed oils and cocoa butter make it moisturizing to reapply throughout the day.

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Small amount of product.
review: I have used mineral Fusion products for years, really like that they are a cleaner nontoxic choice. I ordered the color Inspire, very happy with that part, pretty color on my skin tone. I'm blonde, and blue eyed with neutral/medium skin. No lasting coverage to speak of, if you talk or lick your lips, it's gone pretty quickly. I don't mind reapplying when needed, but there is very little product in the tube. I will reorder, just disappointing, they must have chosen to reduce the amount of product instead of raising the price drastically. Same with their eyebrow pencil, it's more like a "big" sample, SO tiny around and pretty short as well.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 24 February 2024

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: IS THIS AUTHENTIC?
review: I had used mineral fusion lipstick in a dark brown container which i loved. i got this and it was in a light tan container and it was not as rich and beautiful.maybe they changed formula?  the color of container made me wonder if it was 'mineral fusion'.  I wrote company but did not hear back.It's ok though.  from now on I will be buying my cosmetics in person, as I have never been too happy with on line ordering of cosmetics for this reason. I really hope you will be more lucky.

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Crush
review: Excellent lip stick. My favorite for a few years.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 January 2024

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Cracked at base and I did nothing to cause it
review: Used the lipstick about four times and it cracked off at the base. No I didn't have it all the way extended or drop it or anything else to abuse the lipstick; it just cracked. It did not moisturize my lips. It was more like paint, sticky before it dries. Obviously the longevity of the product was a bust. In terms of how long it stayed on my lips? The edges stayed long after the rest of the product came off. Was it flattering? Not for me. I'm in my late 60s, so this lipstick not only bled off the edges of my lips but highlighted wrinkles in my lips. Have you ever seen old ladies who look like they missed their lips when putting on lipstick? That's how this product looks on me. Have you ever seen the lips of kids who keep licking their lips and the edges look red and chapped. Me again with this lipstick. I took a picture, but when I cropped it to just show the product, well I thought better of it and decided not to post it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 19 January 2022

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Crush...beautiful color for my fair/mature skin palette
review: Crush is quite pigmented and bright. I also bought Nude and layer it over Crush. Together they are unbeatable.

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Probably flattering for someone else
review: This lipstick has a feel that is somehow dry and oily at the same time, probably due to the mineral powder fighting with the moisturizing ingredients. That doesn't sound good, but it's not actually uncomfortable, stays on, and isn't sticky, although I find I need to blot it. I blot most lipsticks, however.I bought this in Ruby and Peony. I am reviewing Ruby here. I thought it was a pretty pinky-red shade, and it is, but it is a bit dull. It has slightly greyish undertones (I have olive skin). If you subscribe to the four seasons theory of colour, I'm pretty sure it is a summer lipstick, whereas I am a winter. It is quite pretty, but I find it a little dull on me.The one real issue I have with this lipstick is its scent. It's very strong and not all that pleasant. I don't think it smells as if it has gone bad or anything. It is just heavily scented with a sort of chemical smell I don't like. Worse even than L'Oreal.Otherwise, it comes in a pretty metallic tube that feels heavy and "expensive". That's on the plus side of things. Hope this helps.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 May 2022

title: I really liked this lipstick at first, but it broke inside the tube and it is unusable.
review: I really liked this lipstick at first, but it broke inside the tube and it is unusable. The color is very nice, but the lipstick should not break.  The packaging is a problem with several Mineral Fusion products.  In this case the lipstick breaks in the tube and in the case of the powder foundation the lid hinge breaks.  This is a shame because the lipstick and the foundation are very good, but in the end you are paying for a cosmetic that cannot be used shortly after opening.

It goes on smoothly and is long lasting with strong pigment. Nice light flavor. There‚Äôs a young lady on youtube that shows you all the colors by applying them on her lips. prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Very hydrating
review: This lipstick makes your lips feel very hydrated. I‚Äôm bought the NUDE color and it is a very nice color. The formula isn‚Äôt super thick and sort of melts into your lips. The colors to choose from in the pics are terrible and don‚Äôt match the actual product. I went to YouTube to find people who bought and actually swatched the product before choosing my color. The smell took me back a bit when I first applied the lipstick and I was disappointed I wouldn‚Äôt be able to deal with it, but over time I got used to it and I don‚Äôt mind it at all now. The color lasts somewhat if you let the lipstick ‚Äúdry‚Äù or soak into your lips before doing anything that would mess it up. Overall, I love that the ingredients are non-toxic and that it is hydrating. This is the most hydrating lipstick I own. I would love to try some of their other lips products.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 14 August 2019

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: I really like this pink/ coral color
review: So I love Mineral Fusion lipsticks, despite the conflicting reviews. They have great colors, are moisturizing, wear well during a day, are safe for those with gluten allergies, and worth the expense. I‚Äôve been using their makeup on & off for several years.Im trying to get spring ready and am working on finding the perfect pink/ coral mix. I use to love the color Orgasm by NARS, but am no longer able to use it. INSPIRE is closer to what I am going for. Although I did just order Crush. So I‚Äôll do a comparison once I receive it.The color is very attractive. Works well with my skin tone, which is fair with a yellow undertone. I did a test on my wrist with a comparison of colors. But it‚Äôs deceptive. And hard to see what those lipsticks truly look like. They appear very sheer in the image but are actually not.Inspire is a medium pink with a coral/ orange undertone. It would probably look attractive on most skin tones. A good neutral that can be topped with gloss if needed.. Not overly bright. I can see this working well for the transition into spring/ summer.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 January 2020

prod_name: Mineral Fusion Lipstick, Alluring
title: Wow, purpley! But pretty and durable.
review: My migraines are triggered by FD&C red dyes, so I primarily bought this lipstick because it's one of the few brands that I can wear safely!  Yay for that! This is a good purchase and I wear it pretty often. The formula for some reason is quite drying, though, and if you don't exfoliate your lips, it will tint the dryer areas more deeply than the rest. It stays on very well and keeps its sparkle. VERY pigmented! Even a light application gives a bold color.On to the color. I have dark brown hair and cool ivory skin (pink undertones), and this is an OK shade on me. VERY purple! Much more purple than it looks in the picture.  It's about as close to purple as you can go while still calling the color 'red' - deep fuschia, perhaps. Something close to Pantone 208 PC. It looks good on me, but I was hoping for something redder. Mineral Fusion's "Mystery" is a good alternative, if you prefer something less purple but still shaded for cool-toned skin.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 December 2014
