title: Subtle Natural looking Color
review: Forever Pink - My skin is warm, fair-medium and it added a nice flush of color and light glow on my checkbones and brow bone.  Looks natural and is buildable, but you don't need much.  Wait a few minutes before adding more.  It lasted all day and feels light on your skin.  Love it on skin.Lips: If your lips are very dry, you need to exfoliate dry lips first or it will pill on your lips.  It's not drying on lips, but not very moisturizing either.  I like the color on my pale lips as it makes them look darker and still very natural and subtle.  The only downside is it doesn't last long on my lips, but nothing does.  After the morning application, I'd rather reapply a $5 tinted balm in my pocket that I can use all day for more moisture.I'd still reorder it, but only because I think it looks very good on skin.  If your lips aren't on the dry side, it may last a long time and is great for a more natural look.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 January 2024

prod_name: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip Stain, Forever Pink
title: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip & Cheek Stain
review: This is my 3rd Just Kissed Lip & Cheek Stain and I really like it. So far I've tried pink and red colours and I liked both of them. The colour is quite strong, sth in between lipstick and lip gloss but definitely stronger than lip gloss. Nicely moisturising and very smooth on the lips. I will buy again.

Just enough color to make your lips look they are there. Also works really well as a blush. My only complaint is that they don‚Äôt have a more rose color to mimic a moreNatural lip color. These are light peach and medium peach.

It also smells like cheap make up. Fine but not work the money.

prod_name: Jane Iredale Just Kissed Lip Stain, Forever Pink
title: Der Preis ist unversch√§mt
review: Ich war sehr neugierig auf diesen Lipplumper, da die Marke Jane Iredale im Internet sehr gut bewertet wird und ich eine M√∂glichkeit gesucht habe den Lippen eine m√∂glichst zarte, nat√ºrliche aber doch intensivere Farbe zu verleihen. Au√üerdem hat mich fasziniert, dass je nach ph-Wert der Haut das Ergebnis unterschiedlich ausfallen kann, gegen ein bisschen Aufpolsterung h√§tte ich auch nichts :-).Als der Stift nach einigen Tagen ankam war ich erst mal ern√ºchtert, es ist eher ein Lippenstiftchen (ca. 0,9cm Durchmesser und 2,5cm lang ist die Lippenstifts√§ule, also das eigentliche Material). Aber die Neugierde hat mich davon abgehalten den Stift sofort zur√ºck zu schicken.Nach dem Auftragen merkt man ein wenig Prickeln aber nicht unangenehm, das ein Weilchen anh√§lt. Die F√§rbung hat sich nach ca.2 min ausgebildet, nicht ganz was ich wollte aber doch nahe daran. Zur Veranschaulichung habe ich 2 Bilder hochgeladen (davor und ca.10 min danach). Man sieht ganz gut die Farbver√§nderung und das sich die Lippen leicht (wirklich nur sehr zart) aufpolstern. Sehr positiv finde ich, dass das Ergebnis sehr lange anh√§lt und die Lippen nat√ºrlich schimmern, wenn man nicht gerade Spaghetti isst auch noch nach dem Essen. Geschmacklich ist der Stift neutral.Fazit: Den Preis finde ich unversch√§mt (deshalb einen Stern Abzug, dabei ist er hier √ºber amazon noch deutlich g√ºnstiger als bei anderen Anbietern), das Ergebnis aber gut und die Haltbarkeit nach dem Auftragen deutlich besser als alles was mir bisher begegnet ist.update: 16.4.2015 Ich benutze den Lippenstift fast jeden Tag, mehr als 2-3 mal pro Tag ist nicht n√∂tig, um eine anhaltende T√∂nung zu erreichen. Ich habe ihn im letzten August gekauft und nun ist er erst ca. zur H√§lfte aufgebraucht. Definitiv ein Nachkaufprodukt!

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Soft Matte Lip Cream

review: Purchased this to try as my Matt lipsticks were becoming heat damaged when I left them in my car. This solves my problem. The small sponge applicator allows for easy application. Colour and texture is lovely. Lasted most of the day. Great price and super fast delivery. Highly recommend.

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Soft Matte Lip Cream
title: Sec
review: Have been waiting for almost 6 months for this shade to become available. While London/ Stockholm are nudes/neutrals for lighter skin tones, this is more pigmented and is a neutral shade for medium-deeper skin tones. I even tried out a Miss Claire dupe but nothing like the original NYX Cannes. The colour lasts and I just love it. It may look more pinkish/brownish depending on one's skin tone but it's just a fabulous colour- neither too bold nor too light.

I do notice that after a while of eating/drinking and using napkins, it wears off and I‚Äôm left with lined-lips, but that‚Äôs my experience with most lipsticks.I definitely recommend this if your looking for a pop of color to wear.

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Soft Matte Lip Cream
title: Beautiful but be careful with the colours, they aren't the same as the photos!
review: After ordering my first nyx soft matte lip cream a few weeks back and falling in love I decided to buy another shade and yet again have fallen in love.The creams are so so soft and comfortable on the lips, the pigmentation is crazy good and the lasting power is pretty good for saying they aren't a liquid lipstick. If you are after a nice matte lip without the uncomfortable drying feeling then these are diffinately a good shout.The only thing I would highly recommend about these is that you go and watch swatch videos on YouTube as the colours don't look the same as they do on the photos on here so i think it's best to go watch someone putting them on before you pick one!Beautiful, still in love and will be raving about these for the rest of my life!
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 June 2016

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Soft Matte Lip Cream
title: It is SOOOOO good
review: I am really satisfied with this productI got the SMLC04 London, and trust me i have never been more satisfied with any of other well-known brands. It actually gives you a powdery matte effect, it is smudge proof, water proof, kiss proof(not faking it),starbucks proof(yes if u sip your coffee, gals chillax its gonna stay) and it atleast stays for 5hrs. I said 5hrs because i had to clean it after that and i had keep rubbing moisturiser to take it off. I AM VERY SURE I GOT THE ORIGINAL PRODUCT. But do be careful.I am not saying it better than kylie jenner lip kit but its comparatively way BETTER than most of the well known brands. Oh and after you apply it nicely it takes a minute or less to actually settle down.

The color is quite pink and very pigmented so you can build it up to quite a bright color if you wanted to or just wear less and have a more subtle shade. Once you wait for it to dry they last a long time and arent too drying as long as you put on lip balm first. The colors are really different on so many people so its really hard to tell what it will look like.

prod_name: Revlon Ultra HD Matte Lipcolor, HD Kisses
title: Buy your Revelon liquid lippies from Amazon because
review: I barely review lipsticks but this one stole my heart for two reasons:1. Amazon does a great job when It comes to selling these lippies well packaged. I used to get mine at my local drugstore. Almost every tube seemed opened and swatched. I would end up leaving the store empty handed as I‚Äôm aware of the long list of diseases associated with sharing lipsticks (mono, common cold, Hepatitis B and herpes are just a few). I am not a germophobe in any sense; but I have became more sensative to my makeup hygiene after watching the Markerplace episode on cosmetics.I ordered the shade Forever from Amazon. My tube came packaged in a plastic wrap. Sealed. New. Fresh, un swatched liquid lipstick. I‚Äôve posted a photo of it so you get the idea. It was so satisfying to open the package.2. The formula is great. It‚Äôs one of the most comfortable matte liquid lippie I have ever tried. I also love that the applicator is fairly flat so not too much product comes out of the tube when you take the applicator out. This which makes it very precise line. It dries on the lips quickly, leaving a comfortable matte finish. Has a sweet scent, but no one that‚Äôs overpowering.The shade Forever (a muddy pink nude) is pretty much my own lips shade, but better. If you are looking for an everyday nude (with pink/brown undertone) that wouldn‚Äôt smudge on you, nor would it hurt your wallet, I‚Äôd suggest giving this shade a try. It‚Äôs very close to NYX‚Äôs Soft Matte lippie in shade Stockholm, but with a better staying power.I hope this was helpful to all my makeup lovers out there :)

title: Burned my lips

Unfortunately, it burned my lips and they are taking forever to heal.  After a few uses, I noticed my lips stinging and burning when I put this on or ate anything spicy or acidic.  I have stopped using this product and have been diligently using moisturizing lip balms like Acquaphor, but my lips still aren‚Äôt out of the woods. title: Setzt belebende Akzente auf den Lippenstift
review: Ich trage gern Lippenstift. Aber selbst bei teuren Marken bin ich oft mit dem Ergebnis nicht so ganz zufrieden. Besonders Nude T√∂ne, so sch√∂n sie auch sind, wirken auf meinen Lippen oft unscheinbar, blass und zu eint√∂nig. Da muss ich dann nachhelfen und der zu unauff√§lligen oder matten Lippenfarbe etwas mehr Leben einhauchen. Das geschieht am besten mit einem Lipgloss, der ein Highlight auf die Lippen setzt und sie interessanter erscheinen l√§sst. Den Trick hab ich von einer Maskenbildnerin √ºbernommen samt einem D√∂schen Highlighter in hellem Lilarosa mit silbrigem Schimmer. Den Highlighter hab ich mit einem Lippenpinsel aufgetragen. Doch irgendwann war das D√∂schen leer. Ich wollte mir ein √§hnliches Produkt beschaffen. Meine Wahl fiel auf den Manhattan Lipgloss Highshine in einem zarten Violettrosa. Dieser Farbton passt erfahrungsgem√§√ü gut zu meiner hellen Haut. Der Highlighter enth√§lt winzige silbrige Partikel, die aber so dezent aussehen, dass sie durchaus alltagstauglich sind.Der Gloss duftet angenehm s√º√ü wie ein Bonbon. Er belebt wie erw√ºnscht jeden Lippenstift, l√§sst ihn weicher und seidiger aussehen.Die transparente altrosa Nuance passt auf fast alle meine Lippenstifte, au√üer Oranget√∂ne bzw. Coral- oder Terrakotta-Farben.Ich hab mit get√∂ntem Gloss bessere Erfahrungen gemacht als mit farblosem, der oft hart und nicht so sanft schimmernd wirkt.Der Manhattan Highshine versch√∂nert alle Lippenstifte, zu denen er farblich passt. Die Farbe wird leuchtender, heller und h√§lt l√§nger. Ich hab das Gef√ºhl, dass meine Lippen nicht so schnell austrocknen, obwohl ich nat√ºrlich hydrierenden Lippenstift verwende.Der Gloss l√§sst sich mit dem kleinen Schw√§mmchen leicht auftragen. Die Konsistenz der Creme ist gerade richtig, nicht zu dick und nicht zu d√ºnn.Gut finde ich, dass der Gloss lange Zeit sein frisches, strahlendes Aussehen beh√§lt und nicht eintrocknet. Man muss also nicht st√§ndig nachschminken.Ich kann den preisg√ºnstigen sowie ergiebigen Highgloss bestens empfehlen.Ich trage ihn allerdings immer nur auf Lippenstift, nie alleine.

My favorite way to wear this is to first use a lip pencil to outline before coloring in with this beautiful shade and brand of lipstick.

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Butter Gloss, Angel Food Cake
title: NA
review: I have very, very pale, Winter-toned skin. Matching lip shades to my complexion can be tough when I want a colour to be deep enough to be dramatic (I'm a goth), while also echoing my natural lip-tone to "light" the rest of my features. Well, we have a winner.Devils Food Cake is the perfect shade for Snow Whites who want to put a bit of blood into their lips, & it applies just wonderfully - the point of the doe-foot applicator allows for precision application, while still picking up plenty of pigment on each dip. It doesn't smudge easily, with a liner, & it feels comfortable; it's never sticky but somehow also never slimy - more like a glaze than a gloss! It feels conditioning, but not greasy, & I *love* that it's unscented & unflavoured.I don't know how long it'll last on my lips; it *is* only a gloss, after all, & it'd just be unfair to expect it to behave like anything else. But I can say that while it lasts, the colour wears true. And this hue is just *so* flattering for a blue/pink-toned complexion.An absolute steal at twice the price.

prod_name: NYX Professional Makeup Butter Gloss, Angel Food Cake
title: Luscious Lips with Comfortable Wear
review: I‚Äôve been using NYX Professional Makeup Butter Gloss in the Angel Food Cake shade, and it‚Äôs quickly become one of my favorites. The true mauve color is beautiful and versatile, suitable for a range of skin tones and occasions.The texture is what stands out the most. Unlike many lip glosses that can feel sticky or heavy, this butter gloss lives up to its name with a smooth, buttery application. It feels comfortable on the lips, and I can wear it for hours without any discomfort.The gloss provides a lovely shine without being overly glossy, striking the perfect balance for those who want a noticeable yet understated look.It‚Äôs easy to apply, with a wand that allows for precise and even application. The size of the gloss is also convenient for carrying in a purse or a makeup bag.The gloss is fairly long-lasting for a non-sticky formula, though it does require reapplication after eating or drinking.The reason for giving it four stars is the need for frequent reapplication to maintain the color intensity.Overall, the NYX Professional Makeup Butter Gloss in Angel Food Cake is a fantastic product for anyone looking for a non-sticky, comfortable, and beautifully colored lip gloss. It‚Äôs a great addition to any makeup collection for everyday wear or special occasions.

prod_name: Revlon Super Lustrous Glass Shine Lipstick,
title: Shine the lovechild of lipstick and gloss.
review: Revlon the lipstick of yesterday and apparently today. This is my third one. I bought the peach one this time. The colours are as they appear, in a nice glistening format. It's not sticky at all and doesn't feather or bleed. That being said a little  lip liner wouldn't go amiss. Revlon shine does just that and it's moisturizing, no more dry wrinkly crinkly looking lips. You will have to reapply as its staying power is less than traditional lipsticks, but it is so worth it. They do get a little soft in really hot weather but that's not a deal breaker for me. Try one I don't think you will be disappointed.

prod_name: Revlon Super Lustrous Glass Shine Lipstick,
title: EVERYONE said "Girl, that is YOUR lipstick!"
review: Yep. I bought this lipstick in three shades when it first became available in stores and hoped to never look back. After I changed my copper red hair to a cool mahogany, though, #009 (Toasting Glasses, a dusty rose shade with soft brown undertones to keep the color natural) became the ONLY shade that PERFECTLY complimented my new hair color, pale skin, and green eyes. You know, when you find your perfect jeans, your perfect supportive-but-cute t-shirt bra, and the perfect lipstick how you pray you'll never have to look ever again? That's what this lipstick did for me. Whenever I was in a store that carried it I would always visit the cosmetics aisle and buy up whatever was there. I rarely found more than two tubes, usually finding my shade (and several others) perenially out of stock. The fact that stores often seemed to be "out" set off alarm bells (been through this rodeo more times than I could ever count...) but I always had a few nearly used-up backup tubes to get me through till I could buy up more. Thanks to the caprices of cosmetics manufacturers, I knew my search for the next "okay" substitute was up the road... again. I'm just so tired of having to go through this ALL THE TIME. Back in the day, great shades of lipsticks stuck around for twenty or thirty years (Revlon's Cherries in the Snow may not be for me but it's been around forever because it's a lot of other women's "perfect"). Now, every season, cosmetics companies start over, like with fashion, only, cosmetic colors/formulas that work perfectly with a person's skin tone, hair color, eye color, etc. are RARE and don't really ever need changed-out. It's what makes the beauty industry separate from the whims of the apparel industry. When I swung by the cosmetics aisle in a nearby store last week, sadly, a woman stocking the Revlon products was forced to witness my meltdown as I saw my shade was gone. SHE was the one who noticed the entire line of soft-shine buildable lipsticks had been replaced with different colors (and, as I was to quickly learn, a vastly different formula) in an ever-so-slightly different tube. I knew I was making a mistake but I bought two, only to find my soft-shine formula had been replaced with yet another hideous practically-matte formulaüò°ü§¨. Neither tube made it into my house. Tried them in the car where both were promptly tossed in the trash. Nope. I HATE matte and it's ugly stepsister, CREAMYüôÑ/MATTE. I HATE that feeling of defeat, of being forced to waste vast amounts of precious time and money trying to find yet another perfect go-to lipstick, only to wind up with another thirty or forty failed experiments. The stock-woman suggested Amazon and I DID find MY lipstick here. But I know how this story ends. I need to make time (again) to look for a lipstick I'll love as much as this one because what's being sold here is only what's left over, since Revlon has probably ceased production.At any rate, I truly love this lipstick beyond words. This formula is perfect for people who DESPISE both the bone-dry matte/matt-ish lipsticks cosmetics companies WILL NOT STOP PUSHING, or the high-shine, over-the-top, gloppy glosses that scream 1979. The soft shine of THIS formula is just perfect - and the buildable soft-to-intense color (I like the middle ground) is great for those who prefer anything from subtle lip-balm color to a Va-Va-Va-VOOM pout. Finally, I want to say something about the the type of people who seek out this type of lipstick. We LOVE pretty shine and when it comes to these types of formulas we know the pros (see above) and we accept the cons. WE KNOW we will need to apply this lipstick often but we are fine with that because we LOVE the silky texture, the way it looks, and the way it makes us feel. We accept that pressing the lipstick to our lips all the time means that the less of it that's left equals a bit more of a mess. We KNOW that's going to happen but because we love it, we buy it. In a perfect world we could have perfect lipstick to the end. However, we know the looser formulas will never stay solid-till-the-end the way drier formulas can. But skim through the reviews and you'll see that those of us who love a soft shine ACCEPT the cons WITH the pros. If you'll get irritated by a little mess 3/4 of the way into the tube, no shiny lipstick will make you happy. I hope Revlon undrstands that people who love a shiny, buildable lipstick get it. I mean, look at the pictures with some of these reviews. Every shade is (was?) PERFECT for SOMEBODY. If Revlon would continue to sell this product online, some of us would never stop coming back for more. if they never caved to the haters I think a lot of us would have worn our perfect shades to our graves.Meanwhile, my heart is breaking... again because nothing gold can stay üò™
date: Reviewed in the United States on 18 May 2022

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: Cherrywood
review: First time trying these products. I love the burgundy cherrywood color so much. Very nineties. Reminds me of blackberry by Revlon, but now I avoid all of the toxic chemicals. These are a bit cleaner. I would call it more of a moisturizing lipstick than a tinted balm. There is great color payoff. While the color is buildable, if you are looking for a lightly tinted balm, I would skip this, as they might be too intense for you. The color fades slightly after application, presumably from the balm absorbing, but still lasts several hours if you leave it alone. Cherrywood does leave a slight stain, which I also like. I can apply gloss and still look like I have some color to my lips. This is important to me as my lip color is slightly fading with age.Applicator: some reviewers said the applicator is messy, but it‚Äôs user error‚Ä¶only if you smear the product all over inside the cap will it then transfer to the outside of the tube. The lid CLICKS when closed, which is brilliant because it stays closed in my purse, so these are awesome for travel. I like that I can retract the product after applying, as some brands only go out further and, if you accidentally extend it too far, you‚Äôre in danger of it smushing it in the lid. This was a well thought out feature with this brand.Flavor/scent: there is almost none. I prefer this, because it keeps me from licking my lips once I apply. One reviewer said this shade tastes like cherry; It does not at all. A few other reviewers said it tasted like old lipstick. I can only assume that they got a bad batch, and they should process a return to get a replacement.Upon liking this color so much, I also ordered Cinnamon Raisin, which is a warm-neutral mauve. I‚Äôm going to order a few other colors. I wish they made a bright poppy, orange red, since I see they are adding new colors all the time, maybe that‚Äôs coming down the pipeline.Hope this review helps!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 24 February 2024

prod_name: (Canyon Rose) - Julep It's Balm Lip Balm Crayon
title: Great color, and texture.
review: I love this color it‚Äôs a beautiful dark wine shade. I‚Äôve been searching for one for forever, that still works with my super pale skin and dark hair without washing me out. Like others have said it‚Äôs build-able and hydrating. I found it to have a nice stain to it to, maybe because I chose a dark color. But, even though it requires multiple applications a day to retain the same color there is some color left over after eating/drinking which I liked. The texture is amazingly dewy and smooth, and leaves my lips hydrated. Due to its texture, and light staining I prefer it over my traditional lipsticks in the same colors. My one qualm is the applicator gets a bit dirty on the sides of the plastic tube. Some of the color gets on the cap and rubs the side of the plastic tube, but I just wipe it off after a few uses and it‚Äôs good as new. Due to the price and quality of the product I still count this as a win, and will purchase more shades and colors.

review: I purchased this "Julep It's Balm: Tinted Lip Balm + Buildable Lip Color" in the color Canyon Rose. I have very fair skin with cool undertones and dark lips. As a woman of a certain age I find dark lipsticks no longer suit me. Lip colors lighter than my lips look awful. I'm always searching for the perfect medium pink with cool tones. This is close.This is very moisturizing and glides on smoothly. It offers smooth, even coverage. I find this more flattering on me when applied lightly and topped with a light dab of Covergirl Clean Fresh Yummy Gloss in My Strawbooty.I like that this is made with natural products. What I didn't like was the manufacturer packaging. It came in a box without seals and the product itself had no tamper evident seal. It was in an unsealed box and the cap just pulled off. I will likely not buy this again.

This "lip stick" is a moisturizing lip color that delivers a natural gloss finish. The color appeared to be the perfect a Rose red onscreen. When I received my lipstick it appeared rather "purple-ish" but still within my "color pallet". When I applied the Canyon Rose, the color was absolutely üíØ % perfect for me.!!  The lipstick glides on leaving lips feeling soft, drenched with color & glossy. This could raise a "potential issue" for some people.  CANYON ROSE has a natural, glossy finish.. This is a non-issue for me, however if you don't care for a glossy finish, choose carefully while looking at the JULEP BEAUTY Lip Colors. There are many colors and finishes to choose from.  I will be purchasing several additional items from Julep Beauty. I highly recommend these products. This lipstick is glorious ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è.

So easy and long-lasting I decided to wear during the day, with no regrets. Only downside is a slightly odd smell (not terrible, not great) that eventually went away after 2-3 uses. Ultimately liked this so much, ended up buying in another color, and will buy more.

title: Eccezionale, basta saperlo usare al meglio.
review: I rossetti liquidi in 2 step mi piacciono particolarmente perch√© uniscono in un solo prodotto le caratteristiche positive di una tinta labbra (a livello di durata) a quelle di un rossetto pi√π idratante.In particolare questo √® uno dei migliori che io abbia provato: resiste davvero per tantissime ore (sono arrivata a 11, poi ho dovuto struccarmi) e non teme cibi oleosi, per cui consente, una volta applicato, di vivere l'intera giornata/serata senza preoccupazioni, sbavature o ritocchi.Certo √® che queste tinte vanno sapute utilizzare al meglio, per mia esperienza posso dirvi:- applicatele su labbra asciutte, precedentemente idratate e perfettamente pulite (al massimo utilizzate una base studiata appositamente per labbra)- fate una prima passata e lasciatela asciugare bene senza strofinare le labbra tra loro- fate un'eventuale seconda passata se volete un colore pi√π intenso- una volta asciutta la base colore mettete un leggero strato del gloss idratante, sempre evitando di chiudere le labbra, sfregandole.Il gioco √® fatto, lo strato di gloss protegger√† il rossetto dall'attacco di sostanze grasse, che tenderebbero a farlo sciogliere, motivo per cui durante la giornata potrete rinnovarlo al bisogno, ma nel mio caso, anche senza questo accorgimento, il colore √® durato davvero un'infinit√†, iniziando solo minimamente ad affievolirsi a partire dal centro delle labbra.Struccare queste tinte in realt√† non √® difficile, a patto che utilizziate un prodotto bifasico o comunque a base oleosa (se non li avete vanno pi√π che bene del comune olio di cocco, olio di oliva & co.).Last but not least... ottime performance a un ottimo prezzo!(Il prodotto arriva con sigillo trasparente adesivo su ambedue i lati del flacone. Della tinta son presenti 4 ml, mentre del gloss 3 ml; ha una durata di 12 mesi dall'apertura ed √® "made in Germany".)

review: This is the longest lasting red lipcolor that I have ever owned. Easy to apply, dries after about 1-2 minutes and stays on, and on, and on....i mean this stuff lasts FOREVER. I took a shower, washed my face even brushed my teeth and the lipstick was still on my lips! Once I forgot to take my makeup off, and in the morning the lipcolor looked like i'd freshly applied it! This stuff is basically like painting your lips and the color is also really really nice. A must have!

review: Ho acquistato il rossetto Rimmel London nel colore Little Minx per mia moglie, e devo dire che √® rimasta incantata da questo prodotto.Iniziamo con il colore: il Little Minx √® un tono incredibilmente affascinante. Mia moglie ha notato che il rossetto si stende in modo uniforme e non secca le labbra, mantenendole idratate e morbide.La durata del colore √® stata una piacevole sorpresa. Anche dopo alcune ore di utilizzo, il Little Minx ha mantenuto il suo splendore e la sua intensit√†, evitando la necessit√† di ritocchi costanti.La confezione da 1 unit√† √® pratica e adatta a portarla ovunque. Il rossetto √® stato una scoperta preziosa nella borsa di mia moglie, pronto per essere applicato in qualsiasi momento.In conclusione, Rimmel London Little Minx √® un rossetto che incanta e sorprende. Il colore vibrante, la texture morbida e la lunga durata lo rendono un accessorio di bellezza eccezionale. Mia moglie lo adora e non pu√≤ fare a meno di indossarlo per creare un look audace e seducente. Lo consiglio vivamente a tutte le donne che desiderano aggiungere un tocco di glamour e fascino al loro look quotidiano!

Destaco en √©stos que se queda una textura muy ligera y al final se me acaba yendo un poco por la mucosa al comer y con el paso de unas cuantas horas (pero esto me pasa con todos, no lo considero un defecto en s√≠ del producto). Un retoquito y ya est√°, pero en este caso, al fundirse bastante con el color de mi labio, ni siquiera es que haga mucha falta (si fuera un color m√°s fuerte, quiz√°s s√≠).Entre la capa de color y el brillo/fijador hay que apenas esperar, se seca r√°pido. Al principio no se queda mate del todopero con el paso del tiempo s√≠ (de todas formas, para m√≠ no es ning√∫n problema, tampoco es que quede super glossy ni nada por el estilo, apenas brillosito). prod_name: Rimmel London Provocalips 16HR Kiss Proof Lip Colour
title: Doppio uso, matte e lucido!
review: Il rossetto si presenta come un lucidalabbra, ma ha due parti.La parte colorata ha finish matte, ossia opaco, quindi √® una tinta labbra no transfer a tutti gli effetti. Pu√≤ essere usata da sola e gi√† cos√¨ ha un bellissimo effetto. Se vi piace, passate l'altro scovolino, che √® il fissativo che d√† un finish lucido.Il rossetto si asciuga molto presto, tanto che lo scovolino lucido, passato dopo, √® rimasto pulito!Non si toglie facilmente (anche dopo essermi struccata mi sembrava ci fosse della pigmentazione sulle labbra), quindi √® durevole.Ho messo varie foto per farvi vedere l'effetto dei vari colori e della loro durata.1) Flirty Fling con lucido2) Flirty Fling senza lucido, solo matte3) Flirty Fling, c'√® ancora pigmentazione dopo una giornata in cui ho mangiato e bevuto normalmente.4) Kiss me you fool, versione matte5) Fire Creacker, versione matteDalla foto si vede l'effetto morbido, non avvertivo l'effetto "tirante" che molte volte danno le tinte labbra.Consiglio di aspettare che la parte colorata si sia asciugata prima di stendere il lucido, in questo modo lo scovolino bianco resta sempre completamente pulito.Personalmente preferisco la versione matte senza lucido, mi piacciono pi√π le tinte opache sulle labbra, ma ovviamente √® questione di gusti!Arriva sigillato e anche questo mi ha fatto piacere, i trucchi senza sigillo sono antigienici e li rimando immediatamente indietro.Consigliatissimo, uno dei migliori (se non il migliore) rossetto no transfer mai provati, anche i colori pi√π sgargianti donano un bell'effetto, prezzo assolutamente competitivo e tenuta performante.

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Soft Matte Metallic Lip Cream
title: It doesn't budge! But color description is way off
review: Milan is actually a true pink on me, not a brown-pink as advertised. It's definitely bright and not dark. I still like it, even though it's not a typical look for me. The best thing about this lip color is that I can eat an entire meal without it rubbing off. That's a rare lipstick! It does require a little extra effort to remove at the end of a day. Application feels nice; it's slick and glides on smoothly. It's instantly opaque with a shimmery metallic finish. This is for you if you want something fun.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 November 2023

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Soft Matte Metallic Lip Cream
title: If you're a Budapest fan...
review: Nyx's Budapest is my favorite shade of lipstick (Budapest original is shown in my selfie). I was excited to find the same shade with this metallic matte finish (love the modern yet natural look of matte! üòä). I applied it, let it dry, looked at it, it looked off and the color wasn't as flattering as usual. The metallic Budapest is a fairly different shade, when put side-by-side, than the original Budapest matte finish. The original Budapest is more of a mulberry color (like a rosey mauve color), the metallic Budapest is way more coppery orange, like a rosey pumpkin shade. I love Nyx lip products, they're flattering colors with great coverage, you can't feel that you're wearing their lip products, never sticky or hot, great quality products for a low price so it delivered in that sense. But I had to take away a star for the color not being like the original. I would understand putting a gold metallic in the shade so it would look "metallic" but it's too orange and throws off the whole color. If you didn't buy Budapest you'll probably be happy with your purchase though, still great lip color! ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 May 2021

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Soft Matte Metallic Lip Cream
title: Love it
review: I‚Äôm a girl who doesn‚Äôt wear a ton of makeup. I‚Äôm a minimalist but always want a slight tint to my lips. This red is actually perfect for what I do! I dab just a little of it on and then smooth it out with chapstick for the perfect amount of color. It lasts a while as well. I‚Äôm a sensitive ginger and a lot of products make my lips feel irritated but not this one :)
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 September 2021

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Soft Matte Metallic Lip Cream
title: A major lip product homerun!
review: I accidentally purchased 2 of these in Copenhagen but I'm really glad I did.  I put a light layer of it over the top of Maybelline 24 hour super stay in the color Always Heather and I LOVE it.  Its a reap wine color that seriously last through anything including eating and drinking!  It also is not sticky or wet at all so I can kiss my husband with zero transfer which is a huge bonus because he hates lip products getting on his lips.  I plan to purchase several of the NYX super soft matte metallic shades as the metallic ones are the ones that last their regular matte ones are still kinda wet when they dry down.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 March 2019

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Soft Matte Metallic Lip Cream
title: Lovely shade, feels good, best used with a moisturizing chapstick to avoid clumping
review: Very happy with this shade. I get compliments on it all the time. Lasts a nice while if you also use it with a moisturizing stick or chapstick to keep from clumping. Otherwise, can feel a little dry or pasty.  I'm very happy with it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 July 2022

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Soft Matte Metallic Lip Cream
title: Pretty but deceptive
review: I was expecting a shimmery champagne kind of baby pink, based on the pictures. I also own a Milan shade lip liner, which is quite light - so I was definitely expecting this lip shade to be similar. I was shocked to see that instead, it is a very bright barbie-type shade of pink. Don't get me wrong, it's still a pretty color - just not at all what I was expecting.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 March 2021

prod_name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Soft Matte Metallic Lip Cream

prod_name: 3INA MAKEUP - The Lipstick 270 - Dark Red Matte Lipstick
title: Worth the price
review: The lipstick is highly pigmented as the price would suggest, the smell is pleasant but at the same time very mild. It has decent staying power and won't transfer too much. The shade is ultra nice, I had a similar one from Maybelline a few years ago but it smelled industrial and came off very easily. The packaging is very neatly done, probably the nicest lipstick packaging I've seen. I had previously bought the shade 437 and I've been equally happy with that one as well. It's vegan, cruelty-free and made in Italy (EU rules) so this brand is definitely my new favorite!

title: Rose something is the one I wear most.
review: It is a little sticky at first and takes a couple minutes to dry completely but I really like this color and the price can‚Äôt be beat. I‚Äôve also bought a couple other shades, one called Midnight and I like that color a lot. It‚Äôs more of a nighttime color for me, but I will definitely be buying them both again. I haven‚Äôt tried the other one yet so can‚Äôt speak on it yet.It can get a bit clumpy especially obvious on the darker color so use a light coating and build from there if needed.As with most matte liquids on is with very fair skin, if you get it on your skin it can stain pretty fast so be very careful. Use a liner to help avoid this if you want. It helps but isn‚Äôt mandatory. I‚Äôve done both and both are they both work fine with this formula.Definitely recommend for the price and the pretty colors and good coverage.

title: Lipstick is worth the $$$ product not safety sealed
review: I‚Äôve bought a two shades now from this seller; currently trying the Vanilla Lovin‚Äô shade. The shade itself was exactly what I was going for but the formula is kind of splotchy so with this colour and most of the nudes you have to apply 2-3 coats for it to look even and matte. But once on it stays on even when eating and drinking for at least four hours with minimal budge and reapplication. One thing that bothers me is that these tubes don‚Äôt come sealed with stickers so literally they could be returns or could have been opened and tested but you would ever know Because there‚Äôs no security seal anywhere which is disconcerting for a beauty product. Now that I know this is normal for this shop I‚Äôll buy this line from my local drug store, where at least the tubes are safe sealed (particularly during a pandemic).

prod_name: Rimmel Stay Matte Lip Liquid, Pink Blink, 0.21 Fluid Ounce
title: Long lasting!
review: First time ever buying/using Rimmel. This acts more like a lip stain. Perfect for me as I don‚Äôt like lipsticks that transfer easily and need to be touched up often or end up with some on front teeth. Goes on wet but dries almost immediately so caution to get right amount where needed. I use ‚Äúchapstick‚Äù to get a bit of a gloss finish to change the appearance a bit. Most of the time I just apply a small amount and gently go over lips for a more subtle look. Lasts quite a long time which is ideal for me. Anxious to try other colours as this can be put on super light for less vibrant colour or heavier for darker shade. Makes it a fairly handy way to save room in purse, makeup case. I bought a few different colours to use as I really like this. Also, not heavy with perfume/scent.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 April 2023

prod_name: Rimmel Stay Matte Lip Liquid, Pink Blink, 0.21 Fluid Ounce
title: About the Product
review: I ordered the fire starter. The color is very vibrant but the color doesn't match my skin and that was my own mistake.When you apply the matte lipstick, a little goes a long way. I suggest you pat a little on your lips and then spread it. Then add a little more to the areas you missed because the color is so vibrant and smooth, that it is like putting on chapstick.The moisture of the matte lipstick is unbelievable! It doesn't dry out your lips or cake up. It's feels as if you aren't wearing any lipstick because of how light it is.The longevity lasts you a very long time.My only concern was how the item didn't come with an enclosed wrap.Besides that this is worth your money!Just be careful of the color you choose.

review: This is the perfect clear lip gloss (I got the clear Extra Poppin shade). The formula itself is moisturizing, not sticky, very shiny and glossy. This is great for wearing over your favorite lipstick/lip stain shade and giving it that extra shine. Definitely will be buying some of these in other colors.One thing - it does seem to come off after eating. I expect this with most lip glosses though. That being said, it is moisturizing enough that my lips don't feel completely stripped of moisture afterwards.

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Stinky but cute
review: My immediate impression was how adorable the packaging was, just like most other lime crime products. The packaging is pink and red with shiny cherries on it. I took the tube out of the package, which was also gorgeous, and opened it up to swatch it. This is where things took a turn for the worse -- the gloss wasn't nearly as shiny as I'd expected it to be. The smell also kicked in, and that's when I felt the first inkling of disappointment. It smells like a cross between cherry soda and a port-a-potty! Although the smell could be interpreted in many ways, it will take some getting used to for me. I'm still going to wear the gloss because I love the packaging and the texture (not sticky at all!), but you might want to consider purchasing a different product.

prod_name: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss (SWEET CHERRY)
title: Worth the purchase IMO, Pros v. Cons in the Description
review: I ordered the "Juicy Cherry", it's a light sparkly pink. It arrived quickly without damages (which is rare for amazon). On to the list-Pros: It's cruelty free and much more affordable than what I'd usually buy from sephora for an equally good product. It's cute and it smells good (like an artificial candy like cherry smell). It has a thick consistency with just a slight tackiness; it's not too sticky. Once it sets/dries, it's consistency improves. It's got shimmer with slight sparkle. The pink is like a warm baby pink, really enhances the color of your lips. Slim and cute packaging.Cons:It does transfer and it's staying power is moderate unless you eat or drink, like most lip products unfortunately.I have never been a fan of lip gloss because I'm sensitive to textures and consistencies. I decided to try something new and I'm glad I did. I really enjoy this product.

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Definitely Sheer and Shiny.
review: First, I'd like to point out that these are supposed to be sheer (hence... the product name). I'm seeing some low ratings that the colors are too subtle. If your are expecting an opaque color, these are definitely not for you and you should spend your money on different lipsticks. These are kinda like Chapsticks with a tiny bit of color. Also, everyone will look different depending on your natural lip color. I have dark lips so most colors won't pop on mine but will probably show more on pale lips.Second, some other low ratings are because the colors didn't last at all. These aren't supposed to last. They're just lip balms pretty much. Though I have to admit that I wished the moisturizing effects lasted longer.With this said, these lip crayons are suppose to slightly enhance your natural lip color while giving a shine. Also smells good!There are hardly any swatch pictures online and on the website so I'm posting my own for your reference. I also took pictures (with flash) of the lip crayons on my bottom lip and naked top lips for comparison.My lips are slightly dark and naturally mauve with some deep pink undertones. So when I wear these...- Sherbert gives be a pink tint. (Without flash, the pink is noticeable)- Petal gives me a coral tint.- Chestnut is totally colorless and useless on my lips so I might return this. (I've seen a picture on someone else's pale lips and it really gives her a pretty nude brown/chestnut color).- Rose is a beautiful deep red color. (The flash accentuated the rose/pink but it's more like a deep red rose color.)My lips are dry and these don't accentuate my dry lips too bad. I'm also allergic to some ingredients (I don't know which ones irritate me) and these haven't flared or gave me blisters on my lips yet.If you're looking for a moisturizing lip product, with a sheer tint, you might want to try these. They're affordable and ingredients are less "toxic" (no parabens, no petrolatum, etc).These are definitely perfect for someone with pale lips. For those with darker lips, you will need to be more thoughtful about your color choices because the lighter colors will probably won't show very much.Too bad they don't last a long time but it's worth trying.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 April 2019

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Great product, packing issue
review: I've purchased this twice. The first time the lip crayon was exactly as described. Just the right amount of color, moisturizing, comfortable and light to wear. Not super long wearing, but not terrible either. My 3 year old got a hold of it and it wasn't salvageable, so I ordered the replacement. What was delivered came in a box marked Sheer Rose, exactly what I ordered. Inside the box, however, was Coral. Not at all flattering on my skintone and not worth the cost of return shipping for a refund. I was planning on wearing it to an event this weekend, but I'll have to make due with something else. I still loved my original Rose lip crayon and will probably reorder at a later date.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 22 May 2019

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Fruity smell
review: This product has a somewhat strong, fruity scent. If you‚Äôre sensitive to fragrances you might want to avoid this product and others from the same brand, which I found to have the same problem. It‚Äôs too bad because this company tries to have more health-aware ingredients than most.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 September 2023

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Perfect for my everyday look
review: I have a dark South Indian skin tone, so it is often hard to find compatible lip colors, but the Bordeaux is flattering and natural looking.This is perfect for everyday use; it looks natural, goes on easily, is enhancing, and doesn't dry out my lips. It is like a balm, so doesn't last too long. My only complaint is that it goes everywhere that your lips might touch (drinking a cup of tea pretty much removes an entire application).
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 September 2019

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Nice color, applies smoothly, feels healthy
review: I just started using the Bordeaux lip crayon 4 days ago, and am pleasantly surprised.  It applies smoothly, the color is rich but not too intense and not dated, it moisturizes my lips, and best of all, it feels healthy and non-chemical.  For best color, I'd probably need to reapply it every couple hours, and maybe it would last longer if I wore lip primer (the color bleeds a little), but I'm satisfied with it the way it is.  Recommend!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 March 2019

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: 4 Star Because Cap Won't Stay On
review: Otherwise, great product.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 September 2022

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Not the same product I got before
review: I ordered this online after using up my identical product which I purchased in the store about a year ago.  It was my perfect summer sheer pink lipstick/gloss.  Unfortunately, the product I received is not that similar to what I bought in the store.  The color is less sheer, it is less "glossy" or moisturizing and the color is a bit more peachy.Some people will like this - there's nothing necessarily wrong with it.  It just isn't what I thought I was going to get.I'm not sure if they changed the ingredients or what happened, but I'm disappointed.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 22 July 2019

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Love the color & the feel!
review: This was a pleasant surprise! It feels great on my lips, leaving them softer, not dried out like many other bright lipsticks. The reason for not giving it 5 stars is that it doesn‚Äôt stay on long. It wears off pretty fast. It‚Äôs great to have a non-toxic lip shade as I‚Äôm trying to get rid of all my toxic makeup.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 September 2018

prod_name: Honest Lip Crayon Lush Sheer - Rose Women Lipstick
title: Not worth it
review: I really want to like this product, I'm all about clean beauty and good Ingredients, but like many reviews have said, these break at the slightest touch. I ordered two different colors, one arrived broken and the other broke at first use. Sadly you can't return them and customer service is non-existent. Both Amazon and the seller did nothing to rectify the issue.They are sadly not even hydrating and the lips feel parched after use. The colors are patchy, dunt look good and have no staying power.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 August 2023

Looks like this vendor is trying to dump a bad batch of a good product - what a great way to make a living !

prod_name: Physicians Formula Mineral Wear Diamond Lip Plumper Gloss
title: Ultra-Hydrating Hybrid Gloss Plumper
review: I am beyond thrilled to have finally found this lip gloss after searching for it tirelessly. I used to purchase this product years ago in stores, but it seemingly disappeared from the shelves. However, thanks to my decision to check on Amazon, I stumbled upon it again, and it has quickly reclaimed its position as my favorite lip plumping gloss.One of the standout features of this gloss is its ultra-hydrating formula. It effortlessly glides onto my lips, providing a boost of moisture that leaves them feeling soft, supple, and nourished. Unlike other glosses that can leave my lips feeling dry and chapped, this product helps my lips appear smoother and more luscious.I especially appreciate the lip plumping effect that this gloss offers. While the tingling sensation may be off-putting for some, I personally find it invigorating and worth the slight tingle. The plumping effect isn't overwhelming or uncomfortable; instead, it provides a subtle enhancement to my lips, making them appear fuller and more defined.Another aspect that makes this lip gloss even more appealing is its vegan formulation. As someone who values ethical and cruelty-free products, I am delighted to know that this gloss aligns with my values. Its vegan ingredients offer peace of mind, allowing me to enjoy the product without compromising my principles.In terms of performance, this gloss ticks all the boxes. It delivers on its promises of hydration, smoothness, and plumping, leaving my lips looking and feeling fabulous. It also boasts impressive staying power, maintaining its shine and color throughout the day, reducing the need for constant reapplication.In conclusion, this Ultra-Hydrating Hybrid Gloss Plumper has made a triumphant return into my beauty routine, and I couldn't be happier. Its ability to provide both hydration and plumping effects sets it apart from other lip glosses I've tried in the past. The tingling sensation is surprisingly enjoyable, and its vegan formulation aligns with my values. If you're seeking a lip gloss that nourishes, enhances, and leaves your lips looking luscious, this is the perfect product for you. Don't hesitate to give it a try and experience its magic for yourself.

title: New go to... ü§çü§çü§ç
review: I don't see a massive plumping effect but it is there, enough so that this is my new favorite lip PRODUCT overall. It seems to soak into my lips overtime and actually hydrate them, rather than sit on top and have no benefit besides looks. This means you obviously have to reapply it but you do with any gloss. It has a pleasant smell, I would say just a cosmetics smell. Leaves no gross taste in your mouth. I would say that to me, it almost feels more cooling than tinglingly. So if you're looking for a plumper that burns, this isn't it. But I recently had an allergic reaction to the too face lip injection plumper, I think it's called, so I found this and prefer it so much more. The too faced product left a dark red line of inflammation/irritation around the outside of my lips even after removing the product. I almost gave up on plumpers all together because of that but I'm so glad I decided to try this. I want other colors now. 10/10 would recommend as a gloss hybrid balm that's very comfortable & flattering. 5/10 recommend if you're looking for significant plumping.

prod_name: Kosas Wet Lip Oil Gloss | Juicy, Plumping Treatment
title: My experience for using it for a day & 1/2
review: Got Unbuttoned because the color looks gorgeous when Glamzilla used it. When I first used it I loved it. Just 1 swipe with small amounts, my lips are already glossy & hydrated. If more than that my lips will look too oily.I was satisfied with color at first, but when I really started using it today, I got mixed feelings. One, it fits the description of being glossy & sheer. Two, just an hour or 2 without messing with it, the color became less noticeable & started to become my lip color. I'm not sure if it's because of the lighting or the lip oil got accustomed to my body temperature or something, my lip color looks like a slightly nicer pale pink; my original lip color is pale ash grey nude-pink. I don't really hate it, but when I started to add a bit more, the tint isn't as noticeable. The tint is a bit too sheer for my taste.However, I'm still going to use it because 1) it's pricey, 2) it works since my lips don't look dry or feel super dry (the dry winter weather is killing my lips). Lastly, I think that it works pretty well as a lip gloss or as a base for your lip stick. After putting on the lip oil, I dab a small amount of matte lip product using my finger, & it looks amazing. So far 30 or so minutes in, my lips aren't feeling dry at all!Overall, it's still a very good lip oil, but the color you see on the models is slightly incorrect, since the tint is about 1 or 2 shades lighter. Or it looks like that because they wore concealer before putting on the lip oil, I'm not sure.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 February 2023

prod_name: Kosas Wet Lip Oil Gloss | Juicy, Plumping Treatment
title: Not worth the price, misleading about plumping
review: I am pretty sure the only way that this product claims to plump lips once you really read the box is through peptides and hydration which is nourishment, but don't think you're getting anything near Too Faced Lip Injection or their copy cats. I ordered this shade, unbuttoned, and Dip, and I found both to be too brown and underwhelming on me. I have pale olive skin for reference, and I was personally hoping the pink undertones would come through more. I am thinking about trying Malibu, which looks too pink for me in the photo, but based on how much more muted these were in person it might work.Beside the color and lack of plumping, its not a bad lipgloss, but for the price its not worth it. I am a fan of other Kosas products, and if you are in to their mission statement then go ahead, but this isn't their holy grail item. It reminds me of Mary Kay lipglosses from the 2000s in texture and the high shimmer and gloss. I think this product could be compared to Dior Lip oil, in the sense that they are both decent products, and both marketed to a certain audience (guilty of both!) and sell it overpriced costs.TLDR; if it makes you happy, buy it. But, if you are looking for a unique and innovating lip product, this didn't do it for me.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 April 2023

prod_name: L'OREAL PARIS Infallible 2Step Lipstick, Relentless Rouge
title: Bin absolut begeistert
review: Das ist nach sehr vielen Experimenten f√ºr mich der perfekte "your lips but better" Lippenstift. Ein sehr dezenter und nat√ºrlicher Farbton der aber trotzdem nicht langweilig ist, ich empfinde ihn eher als elegant und ich habe bisher noch nie Komplimente bekommen wenn ich Lippenstift getragen habe, bei diesem hier jedoch schon mehrmals. Man muss allerdings sagen dass ich einen sehr hellen Hautton habe. Meine Mutter, schon √ºber 60 und mit nur minimal dunklerem Ton als ich, sah mit diesem Ton eher "ausgewaschen" und fahl aus. Ich w√ºrde also auf jeden Fall empfehlen, nach Fotos der Farbe online zu suchen. Es gibt auch ein Video zu den Lippenstiftfarben von  L'Or√©al auf Youtube.Die Haltbarkeit ist sehr gut, wenn leider auch nicht so lange wie bei den dunkleren, kr√§ftiger pigmentierten Farben. Das ist andererseits nicht so tragisch weil es anders als bei den anderen Farben auch nicht 100% offensichtlich ist wenn die Farbe nicht mehr perfekt sitzt was auch sehr praktisch ist.Ich empfinde den Stift nicht als √ºberm√§√üig austrocknend. er ist sicher weniger pflegend als normale Lippenstift aber bei weitem besser als lang haltende Stifte der √§lteren Generation. Den Pflegebalsam verwende ich meistens gar nicht weil damit die Haltbarkeit wie es mir scheint reduziert wird.Ich mag auch die Maybelline Superstay Lippenstife sehr gerne, die f√ºhlen sich von der Konsistenz her etwas leichter an auf den Lippen als die L'Or√©al Indefectible Stifte. Ich habe auch die beiden hellen Farben (Quartz Start und Delicious Pink) von Maybelline aber das sind einfach nur helle, ein bisschen langweilige Farben - bei weitem nicht so perfekt wie diese hier.Ich hoffe,  L'Or√©al stellt diese Farbe niemals ein denn das ist der allererste Lippenstift den ich mir immer und immer wieder kaufen werde.

title: NO SE AGRIETA- DURADERO
review: Es de textura mate pero no se cuartea ni agrieta como otros, si lo aplicas bien. Da un tono aterciopelado.Tiene una barra de brillo, que si lo aplicas sobre este, cuando se ha secado, le da un tono hidratante. Esto es por si no te gusta el tono mate, puedes usarlo mate o brillo.Es un color natural apto para el d√≠a a d√≠a.‚úÖ El color es muy bonito, es un tono precioso.‚úÖ No se cuartea ni se agrieta‚úÖ Dura horas y horas, puedes comer, beber, nadar, lo que quieras, que no se borra.‚úÖ Queda hidratado‚úÖ tono brillante‚úÖ tono mateMUY IMPORTANTE APLICACI√ìN:No aplicar en exceso, mojas el pincel pero que quede lo justo, y lo aplicas por el labio. Yo me aplico la parte de abajo y junto los labios y se pinta todo, y si queda algo sin perfilar, le das un toque. Pero es muy importante no poner en exceso, porque sino s√≠ que se agrieta. Si te aplicas poco, queda una capa fina y adecuada. Tarda unos segundos en secarse, as√≠ que ten cuidado de no mancharte ah√≠.COMO QUITARLO:Si quieres quitarlo hay que quitarlo con una toallita desmaquillante y un desmaquillador en crema. Yo he probado con agua , con agua micelar, y t√≥nico de limpieza , agua y jab√≥n, y no se limpia. Solo con desmaquillante en crema.No deja rojeces ni irrita los labios, al menos en mi caso, que si me ocurre con otros pintalabios baratos.
